name: WILL

reviews: MoneyLion has provided me with excellent service all around. Starting with my first direct deposit which amazingly started the same week I signed up for it. My investing account just keeps getting bigger on pretty much every purchase and the app layout is easy to use. You can check your balance, track investing, make changes and even transfer funds all within the app.Their customer service team works quick at getting issues resolved with a positive friendly attitude. I will recommend MoneyLion to all my friends and family for all their banking and investing needs.

PLEASE HELP 😢😢 THIS PLACE IS HORRIBLE 😢😢 YEP AND THAT IS WHAT I HAVE BEEN TOLD FOR ONE WEEK NOW. I AM CALLING THE ATTORNEY GENERAL IN MY AREA IF THIS ACCOUNT IS NOT OPENED BY 1:00 PM TODAY ENOUGH IS ENOUGH.

name: Josh Figone
reviews: Excellent money app! This app offers a lot of services. Including small dollar payday loans and prepaid debit cards. They also offer personal financial education, for a small fee $10 - $20 you'll get to talk to one of their financial advisors that they call "Genius's." You'll receive a 1on1 consultation, where you can ask them any question on a variety of topics pertaining to money/money management. I have yet to try it out myself so that's just what I've read about their "Genius" service but I will soon try it out.

name: Jillynda
reviews: This bank gets me!! And is reteaching me finances 101 along the way!  My credit score has went up 40+ Points!! In a couple months I will have a savings, invested in stocks and better credit.  MoneyLion does things other banks do and more for free! #ROAR  $itsmejilly

name: VJ
reviews: If you need money in a hurry this is a easy, quick alternative than having to pay bounce check fees, but keep in mind if you get paid weekly it will be taken out your very next check and sometimes it could be the same week you borrow! So pay attention to the pay back date before you borrow.

name: S Hunter
reviews: Not happy with the dispute process.  There was an unauthorized charge of $300 on my account.  The dispute process is they email you a form to fill out that can take up to 90 days to resolve.   I filled it out, emailed it back.  I didn't get a confirmation it was received so 2 weeks later I called to make sure jt was received.  I was told they have no way to confirm if it was or was not received and I would have to wait 90 days to know. WHAT!  I repaid on $300 I NEVER RECEIVED.

name: Zack
reviews: So far, it has been a wonderful experience. I get alerts, paid early, and it feels fresh compared to my old bank. 5 out of 5 any day. Oh.. did I mention the investments (easy to use) and cash advances in a pinch.

name: India Eppinger
reviews: I look forward to paying them back and not using them. I’m currently going through an issue where they are changing the amount I can pull out, in the middle of my pay period. I simply paid a small fraction back to have access to it later as I usually do, but now I’m being told I have no access to anything I repaid early until I repay the entire amount. This has never been like this in all the years I’ve used it. Than it took me 30 minutes to get someone on the phone.…..2 weeks later. I recently left a review in which the company responded. This was due to the fact that in the middle of a pay period they would not let me pull out instacash after I repaid. They do have expensive withdrawal fees and use weird marketing tactics to get you to give more by tipping. Granted I only repaid the fraction, that fraction is generally available after repaying it. I do it often if I want to pay it off early and in baby steps . Two weeks later, we are two days out from my payday and %20 of my check always goes into this account. Suddenly today, the company is saying my bank did not release funds. Yes my check is pending or released in any other account

name: Brigette Duncan
reviews: Completely dissatisfied and beyond upset with all of my recent interactions with customer service and it’s features. Switched my direct deposit and all my financial activity to MoneyLion yet not eligible for credit builder plus, agents have no capability with anything besides stating to wait patiently for any concerns regarding my funds, agents do not communicate promptly through sms or email, I have received a $335 cash advance plus another $335 advance that totaled about $650 with fees and was paid on time when it was due. Now I am only eligible for half that amount, on payday. There goes all my hard earned money for repayment but not eligible for a similar amount as the previous advance. If I’m in good standing with an institution and never ever late with repayment along with direct deposit linked, how am I not eligible for a much more reasonable amount? I can go all night with how I’ve been unsatisfied and extremely upset with this institution. When my hold of $120 clears a month from now(unfortunately, that’s how long MoneyLion is taking to process such transaction, I will be considering closing my account and returning to my previous institution. At least there the agents are more helpful and punctual. All my crypto assets I had planned to move over to money lion along with my investments will be canceled immediately. I’ve never been so frustrated and unsatisfied with an institution that handles money and cryptocurrencies as I am now. Most problems do not get resolved and I’m tired being left unsure or confused at an institution that has my hard earned money being direct deposited into. I have a lot of thinking to do but if closing this account is what I have to do then I will proceed with it.

name: Tonja Forest
reviews: I have been using instacash for 6 months or so.  My limit was $165 to 185.  I always paid it back early.  Also I make A DAILY DIRECT DEPOSIT OF $100 OR MORE!  Suddenly my instacash amount is $115!  I call cust svc and speak with Angel.  She tells me that its been reduced because a few repayments "failed".  I told her that was a mistake.  After asking her to look my account records she said she sees that I deposit daily and ALL MY PAYMENTS HAVE BEEN ON TIME OR EARLY!  She still can't tell me why my instacash was reduced.  After demanding to speak to a supervisor and being on hold for 40 minutes, a supervisor named Jack gets on the phone.  I let him know I love the instacash feature and have raved to my friends and family about MoneyLion.  In fact at least 7 friends have become MoneyLion customers.  After reviewing my account in a nutshell he tells me my limit was lowered because the higher limit was to "entice" me as a new customer and even though I DIRECT DEPOSIT OVER $100 EVERY DAY THE LIMIT WAS REDUCED TO $115 BECAUSE OF THEIR ALGORITHM!  I told him that is not stated anywhere.  He said that the enticement method is told to the customer at MoneyLion's discretion.  If I want a higher limit. I should make my direct deposits once a week or every other week.  THAT MAKES NO SENSE!!!!  MY DAILY DEPOSITS HAVE BEEN FINE TO GET THE HIGHER AMOUNT FOR THE LAST 6 MONTHS!  I let Jack know I was unhappy with this and it is not right that the company "entices" (his word, not mine) and then suddenly drops your borrowing power without disclosing this info upfront. I asked him how would he feel if he was the customer?  With that he ended the call and hung up on me!

name: Debra Corriea
reviews: Unfortunately I can't give a good review. I was a moneylion user, and one in good standing at that.i always paid back on time and worked my advance total up. But then the app asked me to ID verify. I had no problem with this. I took the photo of my id. The app wouldn't accept the photo. I tried uploading five times to get the same result. After the money lion app wouldn't accept my id they disqualified me. I have spoken to first level customer service and they say there's nothing they can do. I asked for contact by a supervisor who can give me an explanation of the problem. They wouldn't do that either. I asked to close my account and to take my information out of their system since I can't use it. They won't do that either. So basically I have a useless app on my phone that I can't get rid of or use. No communication to understand the problem and possibly resolve it. All they left me with is a struggle. That money helped my family in between checks and it hurt us when it dried up for no reason. Frankly I'm angry about it and I want a resolution. Either the account closed and deleted or the problem fixed. Certainly since I am not the cause of the problem in the first place.

name: Kee
reviews: To start allegedly in April 2022 I signed up for round up. Nothing was taken out of my account until this past Monday when they took all the money I had left until payday. When I called the representative told me there had been a computer glitch and if I wanted my money back I had to wait 5 to 7 days. Today August 17 2022 I woke up to my money being refunded but then I was hacked by $CohesiveKeagan219. I again called Moneylion only to be told they had to investigate this first and it could take up to 30 days. I was left with .85 to my name. Not even 5 mins later I was down to -.48. I do not recommend Moneylion to anyone!! Their customer service is overall horrible and you are left with no money in your account!

name: Julie Thompson
reviews: Moneylion is fine unless you want something like to revoke automatic withdrawals from your checking account.  I tried to revoke automatic withdrawals from my checking account, but they only did it for loan payments and refused to stop them for their program fee.  They said it isn't possible as it's done by the system and they can't override it.  I feel that they don't want to risk losing their fee.  Avoid accepting automatic withdrawals as you will never get their program fee stopped.

name: Vanessa
reviews: I have had my Money Lion accounts for over 3 years now. I've never had any issues that couldn't be solved without a quick online chat with a representative. I have a checking and an investment/savings account. The only fees I have ever had to pay is the $1.00 a month maintenance fee for the handling of my stocks and bonds. They do everything for you. The ATM fees will eat you up if you don't use the recommended ones and it's kindof tricky to fund your account without a consistent direct deposit. I would also advise to keep your account open with your regular 'brick and mortar" bank because they want you to link your outside account with them in order to do certain tasks that are necessary. The best part is the "Insta-cash" loans that you are offered with no interest. You can receive up to $250 in your account, instantly, at any time. I really do Love this Bank!

name: Mary Ayittah
reviews: Been with Moneylion going on two years now, and for the most part was satisfied with their staff and services. Well that is until July 2022. There was an issue with my instacash eligibility amount. Somehow it had gotten switched to my Roar Money account instead of using my external account. Well the income difference substantial. I contacted a customer care agent and was told that he switched it back to my external account and that the insta cash eligibility amount would be corrected back to its normal amount within two business days that was July 6th well here it is August 3rd and it still has not been corrected I get a different story from every customer care agent. I was told this was escalated to their dedicated team whoever that may be more than a dozen times. I have over 24 hours of real time invested in explaining this problem and why there's a difference in the amount and the math that they keep trying to use on me. I've received 20% of my income on external account for over a year. Because of the perks of several of the different products that I use with them. At this point I give up this thing is nearly costing me my apartment as I was given this information so when moving I failed to make other arrangements to pay a electric deposit. Because I figured that the person on the line working for my financial institution knew what he was talking about. but this happened more more than one occasion with more than one agent as I said before I went through this with several different customer care agents and they were all on different page giving me different time frames and different hope to know about. I apologize for the long windedness of this review but as apparently speaking directly to a customer care agents and having an issue accelerated or escalated or prioritized whatever fails to do anything apparently. Except receive emails where they try to break down the math of why my amount is what it is based off the wrong account which was the issue in the first place. Why am I receiving which quite frankly is ignorant emails saying that basically the problem is the solution? Was thinking about moving all of my income into my Roar money account but if they cannot coordinate any better than what I have seen this month I'm a little worried about doing so. I hope this is rectified and they come back to the standard that I received for the first year and a half of doing business with them. This past month has been nothing but what I have felt like are lies and blow off tactics.

name: James Bennett
reviews: I always know what to expect with my Roar Money account and Moneylion. My deposit always posts exactly when it should so I'm never left in doubt about the ability to pay my bills on time. When the unexpected happens, it is nice to have the flexibility of Instacash. And let's not forget one of the key features of having a Roar Money account, Credit Builder Plus. It really helped to improve my credit score. If it can improve mine, no one is exempt from the benefits of having a Moneylion account that ties all of these features together. I would highly recommend to all of my friends and family!

name: Joel Hardin
reviews: I recently started using this application maybe a month or two so far and I plan to discontinue after my next pay off. I called and inquired on my 250 once I received notifications about being eligible when talking with a representative barely speaking good English he was very smug and proceeded to tell me they were providing more than enough, which realistically is a lie I get paid weekly and would have been qualified for 250 very dissatisfied with his response very bad customer service at the end of the day this isn’t the only application willing to give people money , let alone don’t act like y’all are doing folks a favor that’s what my bank is for if I ever needed a huge favor, I don’t recommend this app.Update 08/10/2022Upon placing my complaint on Trust Pilot the company has retaliated by unlinking my account taking the payout down to 25 when I had been approved for 175 when reaching out to a rep I informed them of an email I received about linking an account I also provided receipts that my account was already linked as I used their app a few times already with no issues up until I raised concerns , the company is discriminatory and will retaliate when they are in the wrong I do not recommend this app try other apps such as Dave. I have enough receipts to report their behavior to the bbb !08/16/2022By far the crappiest company I’ve dealt with they went in an authorized a charge with out my consent to my bank I called and they would not refund the transaction as my bank had me call them back to see if they would reverse the pending charge as it has not posted they have caused me to be charged a fee with my bank due to their incompetence I was not made aware or provided a notice that they would take money from an account that had zero in it we all knows what happens there okay, they wouldn’t know that because of their lack of communication, I talked with two managers and was under the impression I would be refunded and the entire amount would come out on the 26th with the first guy & that wasn’t the case when I called back the second time , this company is a complete rip off that preys on minorities that speak out against their unjust and discriminatory actions then proceeded to show me a document that doesn’t explain anything about the amount they would take, & the time frame they would auto debit an account if it was not payed on time I plan to file a lawsuit against their actions. Avoid this app by any means necessary I wouldn’t wish my experience on an enemy , payday loans any sort of loan would be better than money lion they charge you tips and transfer fees if you opt to not leave a tip they will add whatever amount they want into what you owe, while making sure you do more than one withdrawals to redeem your full amount as you can only do increments of 100. Waste more money trying to borrow and pay back then a standard payday or bank loan, I hope they are shut down in the future and can not cause financial harm to anyone else.

reviews: MoneyLion helps me in between pay days and I love it, will recommend to all my friends & family.

name: Michael Fibbianni
reviews: The absolute worst, if I could rate 0 stars I would. First I’ve been paying off all of my loans ON TIME, but yesterday when I paid off a loan and requested another one, they decided not to give me my money. I’ve been told “it’s pending on our end” “wait 4 more hours” “wait 24 more hours” and “wait 3-5 business days”, but on my account it still says I have to pay it back. Yes, i’ve been told I have to pay back an amount I NEVER received. This app is a scam.

name: Nicholas Alvarado
reviews: I love money lion. I've got the referral bonuses, I love roundup, and getting money is simple. The only thing I don't like is the increments of money in which you can withdraw at a time. This is where they get their money and why I never leave a tip. The 7.99 fee per $100 increment adds up. You can send to your bank fee free, but that takes at least 2/3 business days. You should be able to withdraw the amount of your loan. If this were the case, I'd be more likely to leave a larger amount of a tip. But, all in all. I do love Moneylion.

name: Cameron Younger
reviews: I get my direct deposit sent to Moneylion every pay cycle. I used their instacash feature and have never had a late payment. I recently got a credit builder loan, and this pay cycle, I paid my instacash loan off early. The app said I was again eligible for instacash, but when requested I got an error. When I asked the support chat why, it told me it was due to a “late credit builder loan payment” which is not due for another 2.5 weeks. I called their support line, who told me that even though the chat provided me an explanation in writing, the reasoning as well as the app stating that I am eligible for $355 in instacash — was not only incorrect, but they could not provide me with a reason that I was no longer eligible at all. I also had 13 fraudulent charges made on my Moneylion virtual card. So not only did an entire paycheck get taken in less than 24 hours due to fraud charges, but the ability to access instacash to have any money to use was also revoked, with support giving me ZERO information, and zero help. Do not use this app. It may seem great, I thought it was too for a while. But being a loyal and on time paying customer gets you absolutely nothing and support does not care about you or your money at all! Not only am I out an entire paycheck, but I also have zero support or even answers from the company that is supposed to be guarding my money. Stay away from these guys.

name: Shawn Hampton
reviews: I have had an account with MoneyLion for a year or so. At first I changed my direct deposit to MoneyLion so I could use their Instacash. What they don't tell you is that Instacash takes as long as three months to receive. I kept the account opened and changed my direct deposit back to my original bank. I then stopped using the account. Approximately six months ago I attempted to link my bank account to MoneyLion and it worked. I was authorized a decent amount. I decided I would send my Social Security retirement to my MoneyLion account for one reason only. They advertise that government payments are received as much as four days early. I am familiar with this type of early direct deposit because my current bank also does that with my Veterans Benefits. They state as soon as they receive notification from the US Treasury Department funds are disbursed. I did research and read everything I could to ensure this would apply to my SSA payment. I should have received early direct deposit today from my MoneyLion account. Nothing!! I then contacted them and was told they had received notification and they would disburse the funds Monday. The representative stated specifically, two days early. I informed her what their advertising stated in regards to government payments and at that time was informed that could take three months to adjust. I feel they misrepresented the timeline completely. I was counting on those funds. It has put me in a dire situation. This is basically a large company attempting to portray themselves as helping. When in reality they ask for tips as much or more than payday loan companies require. As soon as my deposit hits I am closing that account and refuse to deal with blatant deception.

reviews: They took duplicate instacash payments from my account in same day! They processed the normal from my debit card and then today I wake up and they took out the same amount again but this time from my checking account. I received a very strange email from them stating "Since we have not received your Instacash payment of $***.** that was scheduled for repayment on Jul 15, 2022, we have initiated a withdrawal of this amount from your authorized and linked bank account." It is July FIRST!! So they took out the payment that wasn't due for another 15 days. They refuse to put the money back in my account today and told me it could take 5 days or so before they can see the payment come through on there end. To top things off the scheduled payment for 7/15/22 is still showing as scheduled so they are going to take it out again!

This however is a helpful tool when you run short on cash and need a quick boost in funds. Money is available instantly and at a reasonable fee,I still wish the cash amounts were adjustable not in set increments. I have had to reach out to customer service and they are nice real people that address your concerns quickly and completely.Overall I recommend Money Lion 100%

name: Steve
reviews: They will definitely loan you money, and you will build up a payment history with them.My bank never seems to be able to connect though. When it’s time to pay, they take it out. It’s pretty simple and easy to use.I don’t like that they kinda guilt trip you into giving them a $10+ tip when borrowing. Of course, it’s lower depending on what you borrow, but it’s still a lot for someone borrowing money due to financial troubles. The instant transfer fee is $5.99 and they ask that you tip because it’s interest free. If I borrow $100, tip the recommended $10, and pay the same company $5.99 for an instant tranfer(if I’m borrowing from you, it’s most likely because I need the money asap) , I’m paying 16% interest. You will be asked for the tip before the transaction and again when you try to borrow more money. I do enjoy this app and the money is there when you need it. I’m sure there a bunch of answers to my complaints, but in the end they will loan you the money(extremely dependable if your payment history is good), charge you $2.50 more for a transfer than at an atm, and then send you a sad picture of a worker who didn’t get their tip, twice.

name: Raquel Ockletree
reviews: As long as you got a bank account with provable income they'll hook you up with an advance. And because it's my birthday this month they let me get an extra 25 dollars. As soon as you pay the advance back it's available to you again. Really convenient app.

reviews: MoneyLion is the best app I’ve ever used for short term loans. It beats the heck out of borrowing money from friends and family. Furthermore, after your loan payment is made you’ll be able to borrow money again 😎The Best Ever

I recommend it.

name: Arnold Pennington
reviews: What a rip-off scam. They make it sound like the Instant Cash is something you will get immediately. That is not true. It will go into your Roar money wallet instantly, but there's nothing you can do with it from there. I needed money immediately for an emergency medical issue. I thought that the Instant Cash would be instantaneously like they say. You have to pay a fee to get it instantly. I paid 799 the first time. I paid 599 the second time. I don't remember what I paid the third time. The reason I kept requesting additional money, is because for three days I was on the phone, or is it a chat with customer service or a bot.. customer service repeatedly told me that I could get the cash instantly if I went through a third-party app such as PayPal, cash out, or venmo. Moneylion would not linked to any of those and it would not send cash to those apps. They had me spend extra money to get it super fast just so that I would never receive it. I still haven't received it. It takes 3 to 5 days to get into my bank, and that's the only place it will allow me to transfer the money to. I have to pay all these extra fees on top of the amount that they won't cancel. I asked them to cancel all transactions Since I no longer need their money oh, and they say that's impossible. I don't think it's impossible, but nevertheless they won't do it. Nobody knows where the money is that I paid to have immediately. The virtual debit card doesn't work for anything. I don't know why they have it. They say online that you can go to a Allpoint ATM and use it to withdraw cash. That is not true. There is no way that you can do it. I downloaded all these third-party apps, in an effort to link them to moneylion, and moneylion would not linked to them. It did linked to PayPal but it wouldn't send money to PayPal. It wouldn't send money to my debit card because the error message said there was a security problem. It was absolutely no way to get cash immediately and I feel that very deceiving did they write that and their description online over and over again. They also say no fees. Yes there is a fee to get instant cash that you can't get your hands on. The contact list ATMs that they have so many of don't work with the moneylion virtual card. That virtual card is useless. I think it's atrocious that they gave me the wrong information repeatedly and I have to pay for wrong information. It's a rip-off. Don't do it. Don't download the app. I asked them to cancel these transactions that still have not made it to my bank and they won't. I asked them to take back their money that is in their money lion wallet and they won't. They just want me to pay the extra fees. Plus transfer fees. I'm so sorry I ever got involved with this app

name: Courtney Bradley
reviews: So after my previous review it looked like money lion was on its way to do something about their useless customer service. Here again my account is LOCKED for no reason I have been with money lion for almost a year and yet again they did it again! THEY LOCKED MY ACCOUNT FOR NO REASON WITH 6000 DOLLARS FROM MY PAYROLL GOING INTO IT THIS WEEK. They had previously done this and again I called customer service and all they can say Is 3-5 days they delay you 3-5 days every time u have a simple conversation that gets you NOWHERE with their team. They already costed me 300 dollars and late fees when they closed my account last week. Today I call and customer service tells me that I NO LONGER QUALIFY FOR THEIR MONEYLION ACCOUNT. NOTHING HAS CHANGED this account had been opened after it was cleared what is the problem now???This process that they have is useless they are costing people money and most importantly time.Their gate keepers at customer service don't have a clue on what they are doing.I guess it's my fault for giving them a 2nd chance.STAY AWAY.

name: Ashley Sinclair
reviews: This is the absolute worst company I have ever had the displeasure of opening an account with. To even call it a bank account is bad on my part. I recently opened a money lion card as my options for brick and mortar banks at the moment are limited for reasons I don’t care to get into. That being said I solely rely on money lion for my banking and everyday purchases such as paying bills, buying my daughter food clothing the daily essentials etc etc. Since opening the account for the better half of about 2 weeks, I’ve had over 3 thousand dollars deposited into my money lion account via cash out from PayPal. Never once had an issue. Made purchases daily and even made major purchases with the account including my rent which is around 1400 dollars give or take. Again never having issues with any of that stuff that is until early yesterday afternoon where I received an email stating my account had been locked due to fraudulent activity. Never was a fraudulent charge on my account and if that was the case, I would have most certainly contacted money lion or meta bank on that matter. To cut to the chase, I basically got that issue resolved after hours of aggravating phone calls to foreign representatives who clearly show no sympathy or understanding of how hindering these situations can be. This morning I was unfortunately met with the same issue as the day before except this time my account was apparently closed with 508 dollars still on my account. Tried numerous times to call money lion and nobody is any help. Surprise surprise right? Anyway, upon calling multiple numbers trying to get a hold of someone who could explain to me at the very least on what’s going on I was met with generic pre scripted answers that had little to nothing to do with my specific situation. I did nothing other than use my money lion card and account for your everyday needs, even read the terms of service to make sure I didn’t step out if line and after reading it 3 times over I knew I had done nothing wrong and it was money lion scamming me for 508 dollars. It’s beyond me how a company closes your account and doesn’t let you withdraw funds. Literally the only source of money I had was on here and now I’m in a frenzy trying to situate a mess I didn’t create. If anyone out there has a resolution to this please let me know because I feel so helpless at the moment. I’m looking into hiring an attorney just because I don’t see anywhere else to turn.

name: Rashaud Estes
reviews: DO NOT TRUST!!! It was good until I disputed $1600 that was fraudulently taken through debit card transactions. I was never alerted, despite having alerts active. Money lion closed my account and locked me out. Said that I violated their agreement. I asked how?? They can't tell me. I asked for my remaining balance but was told that they would "ATTEMPT" return to originator. I supplied the information of the original account in my name but they said they won't return it, it will sit in escheatment for 3 to 5 years... Here are some off my emails as facts: Hello James,This is ***reaching out to you with MoneyLion's Customer Advocacy Team in regards to your received complaint. We thank you for allowing us the opportunity to resolve your concerns!Your account was escalated to me and I was advised that you were looking to reopen your RoarMoney account. As a summary of our findings, effective 4/04/2022, the RoarMoney account has been closed due to violations of our membership agreement.After reviewing your concerns, MoneyLion respectfully declines your request to reopen the account in question. We truly apologize for the inconvenience and frustration that this may cause. We will attempt to return to the originator or it will go into escheatment depending on the state which can take 3-5 years.As this is our final determination, please feel free to reach back out to me with any questions you have on your account or the resolution provided and I'd be happy to reopen your case to help out how I can!Best Regards,***MoneyLion Customer AdvocateDear ***.Thank you for your email. The originator of the funds is cash app. I have all documentation from them that I will be sending you. You already have the information in your system.I have already attempted to have MY Funds returned to cash app. However, I am locked out of the money lion account. Kindly return MY money to the originator. Here is the informationIn response from cash app:Since we’re unable to reverse this payment, we need the bank’s help in locating these funds for you. Please provide the following to your bank’s branch manager or debit operations team.Deposit Amount: note: (I had to remove personal info on this review)Bank Name: METABANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATIOYour time is appreciated. P.s,      Thankfully, I did not want to reopen my money lion account. I just want my money back.ASAPHello James,I am checking on this to see if the funds can be returned back to Cash App. If they cannot, it will go into escheatment depending on the state which can take 3-5 years. Once I receive an update, I will be following up with you.In the meantime, if you have any questions regarding your complaint, you may respond to this email and I would be more than happy to assist.Best Regards,****MoneyLion Customer AdvocateMoneyLion Customer CareHello James,Unfortunately, we are unable to return the funds to Cash App. I do apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you. It does appear it will go into escheatment depending on the state which can take 3-5 years.Your account had been closed in accordance with our membership agreement. Unfortunately, that is all the information we have at this time. If you have further questions, you may refer back to your membership agreement.Best Regards,*****MoneyLion Customer AdvocateMoneyLion Customer care is a joke. They can't help and have pre arranged answers. God forbid if I was relying on my money they have to live and survive on....  BEWARE of the LION.,... Don't trust these people. Ranks of pure SCAM with their unethical practices.I asked one question from money lion. Why can't you return my money???? I did not abandon my account per laws of escheatment. Why can't they answer my question??  They have my bank information. They know who the originator is. Yet, they ask that I remove personal information from this review. I don't have anything to hide. They do....no transparency. No answers...I'm not someone who judges but what they do is  wrong. A legitimate banking institution will not deliberately try to keep your money from you. Do not put your money in money lion unless you can afford to lose it. My experience is real and not biased. I actually liked money lion until they screwed me over and now I know they can't be trusted. I have yet been able to speak with someone from money lion who can answer my questions.  Banks are supposed to be trusted with our money. BEWARE of the roaring lion, they will devour your assets...

reviews: There were fraudulent transactions during the thanksgiving weekend on my account. The card was with me all the time and I was in the hospital taking care of a family member battelling covid who passed away that weekend.Long story short, the bank is not NCUA or FDIC Insured. They have no money to give you even if it is not your fault. My entire pay check is gone.The bank refused to assist initially, requested for paper copies, said blah blah blah we are a paper free company.Finally in the mail after 3 months, they say after their investigation they found that those transactions were not fraudulent.Lol, I am closing my account and will stick with other banks that are at least insured.

name: L Johnson
reviews: Everything about the app is great except the little loans they offer. You can get up to like $300 which is amazing. However, they get you by asking you to “tip” and then you can only get money in $100 or less increments and they make you pay $4.99 transfer fee for instant transfer which, let’s be real here, if you need a loan of $300 you immediately need it. Not in 3-5 business days. So if you need $300 you have to do 3 transactions which means, 3 tips and 3 transfer fees. I feel like this is very predatory of them to do.ETA after they replied I went and looked. It’s not 3-5 business days. My bad, it’s 2-5 business days. I also went to test the whole “don’t have to tip” statement with a $5 loan and while it is true, after you say “no tip” a screen pops up that says “are you sure? It’s how we stay interest free. We recommend a $3 tip” so they guilt you into “tipping” them.

name: Jaime Guzman
reviews: Listen, I tried, and failed, other online banking schemes. Who is not one of those, I ask you? MoneyLion... they are for the underprivileged, the 99% of us who work our tails off and get swindled by the pretentious and uppity bank cats in corporate suits, all the while, we bail out their "mistakes" with the coffers our tax portions constantly fill every year, without fail. Predictably, they keep asking for more. MoneyLion, to me, is a real human-being, sympathetic to our plight, with generous pockets, and has a plethora of information on savings, raising credit scores (with action, not just words). They have 1-on-1 consultations about the pitfalls of spending beyond our means and reducing the clutter in the lingo that the elitist use to keep us scratching our heads. I say this: MoneyLion WAS there when my hometown bank of nearly 23 years of banking wouldn't even consider me for a fast cash advance. That hit me the hardest, so I hit back by withdrawing my funds and investing in MoneyLion. You will not regret the service, the simplicity, and the sound of money in your wallets. What does that sound..sound like? CHA CHING !!!and AAAAAHHH!!!

reviews: I normally do not write reviews for apps like this but MoneyLion deserves it.. And all I had to do is follow the instructions they give you and BAM! I was saved ..With money lion not only do you get your money super fast (like In seconds) but you are able to transfer your funds into your checking or savings account, with out all the hoops and run arounds and they let you pick a day that works with you so you can pay it off with your nxt check .. Matter of fact money lion is so good I had my direct deposit from my job going to a account they help me set up and was able to take a loan over 500$ the very same day .I have told everyone I know about them and I think it’s time I told yous as well .. so if you want to build credit, get a quick loan to pay off that pesky bill , or even open a account where your money starts to work for you get money lion it truly is the king of apps I think everyone should have it

name: Jay Guys
reviews: It’s nice being able to get instacash to help for unexpected things, however that is quickly overshadowed with other problems. For starters, upon opening an account, I ended up using instacasg right away, though my other account was attached it put it in the Moneylion account, no problem right? Wrong. I did not have a card and I needed the money for a bill that did not take apple pay. Too bad because am not able to transfer money from this account to my chase. I have tried numerous amounts, numerous times and no luck. I ordered a debit card, it has been two weeks and I still have no idea where it is, I can pay back from my personal chase account but can hardly use the money I borrowed. Today I had tried to use my Moneylion digital card (connected to apple pay, I have used it before) it declined three times with plenty of the money in the account. Tried to go back and get an explanation from Moneylion or to see what I did wrong. Have found nothing.

name: Adelle Hill
reviews: Let me tell you my MONEYLION horror story...I had a perfect relationship with this company, I loved it. I took out 2 credit builder plus loans...and paid them off on time, never missed a payment...I used Instant cash all the time and NEVER missed a payback...I called the company one day to pay off my balance on my Credit Builder Plus loan and the very inexperienced agent accidentally put my account in collections...I was shocked, he kept me on hold for close to 30 minutes in a panic and never was able to fix it. That was over a month ago. I have called too many times to count and they said the same thing to me..."we apologize...its being escalated to a specialized team.." I have not gotten ANY follow up, no emails and the account is still in collections. Today I was notified by my Credit Bureau that my Credit Score dropped "29" points because money lion reported this as delinquent!! I still have no follow-up and no contact from them I called today and they said the exact same thing! I just want to cry right now.

name: Leslie Hollman
reviews: It's been a bad experience overall. I don't feel MoneyLion has my financial well-being in sight. My Insta cash is keeping me in a vicious cycle. I'm on my second credit building loan without any late payments but my credit score actually went down not up.Then I was offered a promo which I made sure I did everything required on my end which is 1)be in good standing with all accounts and 2) deposit $50 into my investment account and get $50 insta cash. I made the deposit but never got the promo insta cash I talked to customer service who told me that they had forward the issue to support and that I would either receive a follow-up email with further questions or I would see the promotion of $50 in my instacash. I did receive an email from support that day and responded within 10 minutes providing them the requested information which was a screenshot of what promotion I was talking about. I never heard back from there I emailed them about 6 times with no response. Then I saw an email stating that I had to use my $50 InstaCash or it would expire I logged into the app(the website has never functioned enough to allow me to sign in) but but it said $0 into cash available. I emailed customer service three or four more times with no response. I then about 3 weeks later got an email from my direct depositor that my direct deposit have been returned from my financial institution. Then my insta cash repayment and credit building loan became in default then I received an email from customer service stating that I was not eligible for the promotion because my current accounts were in default and not in good standing as required I immediately wrote back stating that that's not the case that I wasn't good standing at the time of the promo. I didn't immediately contacted my direct depositor and they were able to reissue my direct deposit but it would take 3 to 4 days and I still have not heard back from moneylion concerning the promo.I had to deal with customer service several times about the website not functioning and I'm always given the same answer "why don't you just use the app" I would not suggest this financial tool as a means of budgeting saving money financial advice there's no savings account and the cost of insta cash keeps going up.

name: coleman
reviews: If I could give it zeros I would!! Moneyloin was an "okay" app till I began adding up all the fees. First, if you get approved for a 250 loan they will only allow you to cash out 100 at a time. The offers for delivery to your personal bank account holds a fee plus tip. Lets not forget about the interest for that hundred dollars you cash out. By the time you add all those fees the loan isn't worth it. I read a few complaints from the BBB about this company, and one of the advocates states that you don't have to tip and it won't effect you eligibility, but trying to cash it out matters so they lied about that, advocate also says that turbo for delivery is free and only takes a few hours for your money to arrive, well I went and tried to used this method, but it wasn't free, this service cost me 15 plus tips to have the money put direct deposit into my account, plus you add the interest which goes without saying, moneylion isn't honest and I also have screen shots to prove this, so once I pay this account off I will no longer deal with money lion

name: robert brooks
reviews: I have used Money lion for just over a year. It has worked, however, I added direct deposit and things got worse. I recieved an email that they were making changes to thier system, I was to get direct deposit that same week. I checked in the moring and the deposit was not in my account. I chatted with a customer service rep who was no halp at all. All the person would say was "They do not detect a direct deposit to my account". I checked with my employer, who put me in contact with their bank. I was told the deposit was transmitted and acknowledged by the recieving bank. I got back on chat with a service rep from Money Lion, was told the same thing, "The do not detect a direct deposit to my account". This went on all day with them, They told me some one would call me, this never happened. The direct deposit showed up after 4:00pm....Today, I tried to add my new bank to the wallet, the service to get a quick loan between paydays seemed like a good idea. Again, met with more problems... I added the account, it showed up in my wallet, but didn't show up on the roar money side. I again got on chat, they wanted me to give them my bank account number over text,  told them no, I had added it through the plaid system, then they wanted me to delete my app and check again. Seriously, they have the worse informed customer service I have ever used. I ended up canceling my account and service.

name: deann
reviews: I'm leaving my feedback for a money lending app/Money Lion, that is user friendly for the most part. There are pros and cons, but if you need money to help you stay afloat until payday, this is the app for you! You are asked to give a "tip" for the lending services and charged a fee for instant same day transfer of money. It literally happens right away with this option. You can of course, do the option of 5 to 7 business days for no fee. If you decide that same day is a must, you could borrow up to 100.00 for 11.99. Your total amount of money to borrow could be much larger than the amount you're allowed to borrow at one time. You could be approved for up to $300 to borrow, but the app allows you to borrow $20.00 to $100 at a time. Giving a $4.00 "tip" and charging you a instacash fee of $7.99. Once ML is linked to your bank account, it can predetermine on your payday cycle that is reoccurring in history, when they could/can be repaid by you. It normally sets the repayment date for your next paycheck. If this doesn't work for you, you have the option of changing or moving this date around a little. It's never easy to borrow money, but it's a little easier when you are using an app that allows you to navigate what works best for you. Reminders and account information are on the app, it's not hard to use. The app can glitch sometimes and tell you that it's not connected to your bank account, but you can fix this easily. If you need money, give it a try...

name: taryn
reviews: I’ve used MoneyLion for nearly a year and a half now and more in particular- have used the Instacash option at least a dozen times. I do not have a direct deposit into ML directly & I am still able to get up to $150 from ML. Just FYI though: when requesting Instacash, you can only do so in increments UP TO $50 at a time so I personally had 3 Instacash withdraws & not knowing how it worked, have a $5 tip with each request I took out & although the tip isn’t paid out then, at the end I paid out an extra $15 BUT THIS IS A FREE SERVICE so I do always try to tip a little something. Just a thought to the developers: Why not give the option for a custom tip amount because sometimes literally the lowest tip amount it will show all my screen is like five dollars and that may not be a lot to you folks who made this app, but for myself: a single mom to a wonderful, but also disabled child & who- especially right here at the holidays - is balling on a budget, a custom option for tipping I feel would help to generate more money being tipped. Just my two cents though! Love the app & thanks for saving my butt more than a time or two!!

reviews: I occasionally used Instacash in this app. Someone in the company accessed my account, repaid loan 10 days early, took out more instacash for $575, signed me up for Plus Loan, and took out a $1000 loan in my name to be repaid 3 days later.  I contacted customer service day one of this fraud and my account was supposedly deactivated. I cannot access it now but someone is. I’ve left a voicemail for their specialized fraud team and instead of answering when I try calling them I get a message saying they already have a voicemail for this fraud so wait for their call. I’ve contacted my bank to dispute. So far they’ve tried to take $2875 from my checking account.  A week ago i would have told you what a great service this is but this nightmare isn’t worth it. I’ll never use them again.

name: Timothy Gilpin
reviews: I really only use this app for the instacash feature, which does work and can be helpful..but it’s misleading to say it’s interest free! The amount of money they will loan to you can only be requested in arbitrary increments. Example: when I have $300 available to borrow, I have to make 3 request in rapid succession because I’m only allowed to ask for $100 at a time (even though I can borrow $300 at a time [confusing right!] and There’s a percentage based fee on the transaction itself if you want it to happen instantly (which is almost always), so when I need $300 I will be charged $30 on top of the $300 in transaction fees; The app is very pushy with asking for a tips during the transaction and upon using the feature again later, it will remind you that you didn’t tip last time and ask for the tip AGAIN for that transaction before proceeding to the new request. Also when I stopped tipping regularly,  they changed my requestable amount to lower amounts, so that I had to make more request to get the same amount of money (therefore netting more fees for the same amount of money) they also jumbled up the request amounts in attempts to throw you off so you can accidentally select the wrong amount and (you guessed it) need to make even more request for more fee. If you fall for their design you will be paying ~25% interest on these transaction…..that being said borrow carefully and read all the prompts. It has been a helpful tool since I figure out their traps, but honestly dangerous if you don’t catch it at first

name: sara
reviews: I am a truck driver and took a load from Virginia to Florida. Then from Florida to Atlanta, GA and from there back to Virginia. I found out that my account hacked by someone in Houston TX by calling the stores that my account had been hacked based on my bank statement. Anyway, once I got home to try to get an Uber home my account was declined. This happened in a span of less then 24 hours and when I reported it to Moneylion and gave them the details they absolutely refused to insure my money and place it back into my account. Its December and Ive been fighting to get my funds placed back into my account since the 24th of July. Long story short, from my experience Moneylion does NOT insure your money even though they claim to be covered by the FCC, which will be next phone call. Again your money is not insured with this institution and you will have to  QUALIFY to get your money back and beleive you me, they have zero intention on making sure your money is safe or returning it back to you if there is fraudulent activity on your account. YOU may as well be the suspect as far as they are concerned. Please DO NOT put your money or trust your finances with Moneylion. Its one of those places where its all good until it isnt good. And when its bad, its BAD! Ive had issues catching up on bills ever since and again, STILL fighting for basically my whole paycheck. You wont receive any help filing so good luck with that. They may call back but it will look like a spam call, and good luck getting hold of someone that takes your money and your account seriously unless you need to pay them. I cant give up because I cant afford to but I pray this review is taken very seriously to whom ever views it and please please please protect your money. Its too hard to earn to leave it in an unreliable intitution such as Moneylion. As for Moneylion please dont respond to this review, just work on getting my money back to my account because nothing you can say in response to this post to undo the negative effect that your lack of ethics has imposed on my family. I only ask for my funds and to peacefully part ways. Anything outside of that will be received as disingenuous at best.

name: Kristy Carroll
reviews: I requested a credit builder loan. I started my premium membership in order to do so. I paid a fee in order to get the loan immediately. The loan amount did not come immediately. 2 days later, when the loan amount still had not been deposited, I called customer service. I was told by the first person it was a latency problem and not to worry because people were already working on fixing it, but she had no clue how long it would be. I asked to talk to a supervisor. He told me it was not a latency problem. He submitted an escalation supposedly for the correct department to initiate the deposit right away and it would be done within the next 24 hours and that someone would email me by the end of the day to confirm. I got no email that day. And it’s been 3 days since that call, and I still don’t have my loan. If it wasn’t the weekend, I’d have called back by now though I do y expect anyone to actually know what’s going on or help in any way.

reviews: I have been with Money Lion for over 2 years. I have been able to invest and manage my investments with ease. There is also the credit builder loan that I have taken advantage of multiple times and the biweekly payments are small and manageable. There is also the cash advance program which has also been very helpful and I have taken advantage of it frequently. My only complaint is that I have had a direct deposit from day 1 and yet it tells me that it is not detected. Which in turn changes my cash advance amount available. Other than that it is very beneficial and helpful. I get my credit score right on screen and I can see where my money goes and get paid two days earlier than regular checking/savings accounts. I recommend you to many others who have the same circumstances and situations that I have because I know it will help. Thank you Money Lion! Christina LevensonWyoming 😊

name: Jo
reviews: MoneyLion is amazing!  The suite of financial tools available is amazing. If you have an income and find youre short and need some emergency cash, they got you- And MORE IMPRESSIVE(SHOCKING ACTUALLY), is the ability to borrow that cash, INTEREST FREE( i think up to $1000-based on your income and other factors most ive borrowed was around $400)!  They use Plaid, so you can easily integrate your accounts from other banks, they have very good customer support, even on Sundays!  Some services cost a lottle bit but they give you ways to earn that back just by using your MoneyLion debit card!  The App is also actually really useful, and easy to navigate.  MoneyLion is a real competitor to ANY 'BIG BANK' brand, and I can say, beats most.  Honestly, im seriously impressed.  This has been MY experience.  You definately should check them out! -RYAN

name: jess hall
reviews: Over all I cant genuinely complain about anything inparticular. There's room for improvement especually with the customer AI interface. The only true complaint I can see is within the retentions department. Having to resend the same documents already sent and repeating steps already requested is especially burdensome and costly to the client if its not resolved within a short window. I myself suffered late fees totaling around $125 and a small high interest loan just to put food on my table for my son's.  But with there being a holiday it wouldn't be fair to say it's always this way. Room for improvement. The apps start up is cumbersum and crowded. Those using older model phone's will find it crashing a lot before being able to access their information.  Report bugs, such as the apps refusal to acknowledge my need for a new card due to its own malfunction should be clearly visible so they can be sent by the user and addresses asap. Those receiving direct deposits due to benefits or social security should be recognized and not bombarded with continued adds requesting they start one theyve already established. Warnings about policy issues should be given before any attempts be made to lock a customer from their funds instead of surprising the customer and denying them access. Especually with a 5 day wait period.

name: Connie Sue Immel
reviews: I have been a customer of Chime‘s for years. I wanted to find an online bank that offered a bit more. I saw an ad for MoneyLion so I signed up through the app and got my card. Once I got into the app I saw so much stuff that Chime did not offer. I love the fact that you offer different ways for people to save money. I can invest in crypto, I can invest in the stock market, I can choose where my spare change goes when I want to safe or something. I love the Insta cash. The credit builder is absolutely my favorite though. I was with you for a month and I got approved for a credit card which I’ve never been able to do my whole life. I appreciate that I’m able to build my credit up through your app. I will be a lifelong customer if you keep it up!

name: alexis
reviews: During the recent Thanksgiving weekend I noticed a lot of fraudulent transactions on my account and thus has began my Nightmare with MoneyLion.1. Moneylions banking website is useless. You cannot access transactions or bank statements from their website. The only way you can do banking is via the App. You can only use the app to view your transactions or bank statements. The website is useless. How can you call it online banking if you are not able to review your transactions online. 2. The fraudulent transactions need to post for the bank to take action, however in my experience these transactions are in process status for ever with all of my balance deducted / hold because of this fraud. I contacted the bank for help since it's been like a month and my money is stuck the bank is asking me to contact these merchants and ask them to send Money Lion an email to remove the hold3. Customer Service Sucks, they don't know their how their own products or services work.I'm waiting for this issue to be resolved so I can go back to my other Major banks such as Bank of America who's first action on fraud is to give you your refund and then investigate, however Moneylion s policies look different, you got to print and sign a form and send it back with in 10 days, you don't hear back from them, then they say they didn't get the form. trust me it's been a night mare I have also sent several emails Requested to speak to someone in the corporate office. Requested for a call back from someone in the US but to no avail.I hope I get back my money that were fraudulent transactions. I'm gonna say good bye to these folks once I do that

reviews: I had a friend rave about how they could get money right away with MoneyLion. So I signed up. My limit was less than $200 but that was fine. Once I decided to use it I was only able to borrow $50 at a time. Then to get it you either have to send it to RoarMoney which is free but then you have to pay to get it to your bank unless you want to wait a few days. If you skip RoarMoney and want it to go directly to your bank there is a fee, or your debit card a fee. However you get your money, unless you have changed your banking to Money Lion and you have direct deposit set up and a debit card with them, they charge outrageous fees to get your money. And since you can only get so much at a time, you pay the fees each time. It adds up. I have been with my bank for 20 years and I am not going to change it to bank with a mobile app. It is a good service if you do not mind all the fees.

name: Me, You and Nipsey T
reviews: So far My experience with my MoneyLion Banking Account has been pretty awesome. The Shake-n- bank rewards program is unlike anything I've ever seen, after every purchase you shake your phone(like spin the wheel) for a chance to receive up to 100% of what you spent, so far the largest was a $2.25 reward for paying my electric bill. Then there's the InstaCash advance which is pretty great too. The good part about is it sets a limit on the amount you can get base on income AND SPENDING HABITS, this way they know you able to safely repay it. Also if you can wait 2 days there is no fee (but they do ask for a tip). If you do need it instant then there's s flat $5.99 fee not too high but still a little. But ALL-N-ALL I think is a great banking app.

name: Andrew
reviews: I do not recommend this company. Currently it has been 8 business days - almost 2 weeks that my account has been closed by their error due to my direct deposit from my job triggering the account to be closed. I have over $3000 frozen in the account, have been able to pay rent and was unable to pay for our thanksgiving meal. My experience with them has been awful. I’ve called 5 times and emailed 3 providing all information they have asked for with no new information. I was my account would be open in 1-2 business days after sending in verification information.  Ive heard no updates.  Their retention team is not responsive and you will be left vulnerable. Their direct deposit does not enable you to get your check 2 days early. That’s a lie and it’s never happened. Please save yourself and do not use their direct deposit and do not use this as your main debit card. You could get stuck like me. They are good for getting you out of a bind with the roar money loans but not have me in a terrible bind financially. I’m posting this everywhere hoping I will finally get an update. For those in the same boat, I encourage you do the same.

reviews: There is some difficulty in connecting my bank, Varo Bank, through Plaid. MoneyLion does not seem to have the answer and different representatives give different, and opposing, instructions. I was instructed to contact Plaid, and was instructed that MoneyLion should be able to resolve the error. Apparently, my transactions and deposits are not being reported accurately from my bank, through Plaid, to MoneyLion. Plaid has no timeline on the resolution with Varo; MoneyLion does not offer a viable alternative, even though I have been a customer for almost 2 years, and they should retain some history of my transactions.All this being said, my Instacash amount varies wildly from $250 to ineligible. It would be more reassuring if there could be one voice regarding a customer service resolutions, and a consistent availability of offered services. Having such reliability would definitely sway my consideration in favor of moving my direct deposit to MoneyLion.

name: Megan Brymer
reviews: I’m happy with the Instacash app… but as far as the credit builder plus app, I have a couple issues. It doesn’t make sense that you only get the $250 and pay it back, along with the interest, membership fees for both apps, and tips…at least 4 different fees! That’s super excessive. I understand the tips and maybe 1 fee for membership. Then when I cancelled the credit builder plus app, I’m still getting charged the membership fees for both apps :( I cancelled credit builder plus Bc it completely defeats the purpose. I’m want to build my credit, SAVE money, and it’s nice to have the convenience of borrowing smaller amounts and paying back. It does NOT make sense to receive the $250 (credit builder) and once paid, you can’t get anything else until you pay $600 up front?!?!?! If I could do that, I wouldn’t need this app. So that’s why I cancelled that portion, and to top it off it was incredibly difficult to cancel. I had to call and be on hold 5 different times even though I had already paid back the $250 and all interest fees and was willing to pay whatever extra I needed too (which also was ridiculous but whatever)… I was willing to do just about anything to just cancel it. Honestly, Bc of that experience I would not feel comfortable opening a banking account with MoneyLion. I’m still getting charged double membership fees and was told that it will not be taken away. The only thing keeping me with MoneyLion is Instacash. It’s truly a lifesaver for me right now. I wish I had never even tried credit builder. Hopefully you guys can find a way to make some improvements to the app.

name: dani
reviews: Good company hobbled by a handful of smaller operational issues. I want to like this more, I wish I could rate higher.Been with them for years. I like their credit builder loan product, and I like how easy they make it to buy crypto.But everything about their edges is just rough. When something doesn't go right, nothing is ever resolved. Example:I want to start a new Moneylion Credit Builder Plus loan.The app glitched out, and when I get to the final screen? When I click continue? Error Message.I have talked to support 4 different times now with 4 different proposed solutions. Two of the solutions involved follow-up from them in some way - once they offered to send me DocuSign emails to finish everything that way, and the last times they said engineering would be reaching out. Neither actually happened. Unforced errors. Stupid.On top of that annoyance, the product changed. Now instead of a $500 microloan, it's $400 to the client with $100 kept in reserve. So now, not only can I not get a new little installment loan to keep in good standing on my credit report, I'm getting less cash whenever they do actually fix the problem. Stupid.Pairing my new bank account never worked. I haven't used Regions as my primary bank for over a year, but I can't pair my new main account with them because... Reasons. Stupid.They have had a few products "coming soon" for as long as I can remember. Credit cards? Forget it. Theyve been "coming soon" for 3+ years. Stupid. Larger loan amounts directly through them? "Coming soon", again, for years. Stupid.  They're great when stuff works but if something is broken don't expect them to fix it. Expect to waste your time pursuing a resolution that never comes.Edit: this response is a perfect encapsulation of all the complaints I've had thus far. I signed up to money lion using a personal email address that I have had for going on 20 years. The same email address was used to register for trustpilot, in fact it is the email address that alerted me to their reply. Somehow though, they can't find me.And just a feeling of overall unpreparedness or sloppiness, the dead hyperlink that was pasted into their official reply from the support team. This is the level of help to expect from this company. They have compelling offers, I've enjoyed using them for the most part, but if something goes wrong don't expect anyone to have the tools to figure it out.To create a link, highlight the text you want to convert and press CTRL+K. (CMD+K on Mac.)You're welcome.Lastly. The link supplied is dead. It leads to a 404 error page.

reviews: I’m the past several years I have been very pleased with Money lion and all of the services that are available. However in the past 2 months  things have gone crazy. Twice instacash has been given and then taken away. The first time 250 $just showed up  after my regular amount was allotted  . IDidn’t request it non the less I really appreciated the help  . Within 2 hrs the money disappeared with my explanation. I ask what happened. I got some  standard answer and a rude customer service member with a smart attitude. The second time was this month. I repaired my I instacash a few days early and I received my limit . The next day 200$ disappeared  . The customer service person said my deposits which have not changed at all didn’t match. He gave me the amounts of the deposits they were unchanged , however the wording for my state treasury deposit didn’t match and SS deposits all said SS for the last 3 months and beyond. ML computer system is flawed and needs help to read. I ask for a supervisor to explain. Non was available. Waiting on a call back. Of happening to me others are also dealing with this issue. I suggest ML  fix the issue asap and stop causing hardship to people already experiencing hardship. Thank you # fix your program # give explanations about each situation when it happens . # no  surprises. !!!

name: catrice
reviews: I had clear fraud on my account that pretty much drained my account, called first thing that morning after cancelling my card to report it. They told me they had to wait for it to go through and then they cld fix it. Well once it went through my only option was to dispute it and they told me it will take 10 days to review and see if I “qualify” for a credit into my account. So basically someone stole all my money and now I’m having to wait 2-3 weeks to get it back. This all happened the same day I got a call from their fraud system and reported unauthorized transactions. They still let $1,100 in charges go through my account after that. They have no fraud prevention and cld care less ab ppl that are victims of fraud. I’ve been in banking 14 years and never had anything like this happen worst experience ever I will be closing my account once I’m returned my moneySo you just replied with the same lines I’ve been told for over a week now. I requested a copy of your fraud prevention policy and was never provided it. I wld like to know how and why you wld let $1,100 in charges be made right after I reported unauthorized activity to your fraud system. Why have me confirm that someone is trying to use my card and then allow them to drain my account? How does this happen? Do you just not care? Why even notify you of fraudulent activity if you allow it anyways?

name: Chad
reviews: Awesome easy I use the free version and they still give me the largest amount I’m able to advance- and I got all my he advance apps. Customer service I tried to deal with 2x because they have a section that gives you your credit score- I have no idea where they get that info because none of that info is even relatively similar to me. They are tempted to tell me that they received the info from my bank that’s connected w the app and either neither again understood what I was complaining about or they had no idea what they were talking about. In fact on a graph of my credit score the most recent supposed info was in 2019. So I’m never approved for the credit builder loan which 14.99 a month is plus monthly payments interest - that’s wild. Chime has free credit builder that really elevated my score. There are plenty on internet “banks” that have a credit builder card and it costs nothing. You deposit your money into that account, buy stuff, and the money comes out but as credit not debit . But whatever money you put in is how much you have to spend and the money spent comes from the money u deposited. Exactly like a debit card except it’s a visa must be ran as credit and THEY ACTUALLY DO REPORT TO THE CREDIT Bureaus unlike what was being blasted all over social media and news outlets. I saw it today on my Experian report “exceptional payment history,” and I stopped using chime before the news broke that lie.But the credit score deal and the fact that they are using that fake info to deny me for their credit builder card is my only negative- no one & nothing is 100% on point perfect. Impossible. So yes, I think they still rock. The genius (paid part) is great. Lots of tools and advice. But I couldn’t afford it. To those who can it could be a really huge help!

reviews: MoneyLion is the way banking should be customer oriented. I celebrate my 70th birthday on Oct. 28, 1951. I have Instacash and on my mobile app I can manage my account settings. I set the repayment date for October 29, thinking that was the date my direct deposit would transfer to my MoneyLion account. I called and Moneylion explained that everything was ok - they would simply manually make the change on their end. No fees and great customer support from MoneyLion.

reviews: It's best app ever

name: brandon
reviews: On 10/20 I requested $400 be withdrawn from checking to go to external account. I knew it would take 24 hours so I waited. On 10/21 I looked on account and saw that it was in some investment account with moneyloin. I immediately called customer service and was quickly given excuses as to why my funds could not be refunded immediately. I had taken out a loan but paid it back and I had another pending transaction that was not due until next paycheck. I was told by the representative that I would have to pay additional money to pay off the loan that was not due until next pay date. I explained to her that it could be taken out of the $200 that was in the account if that was the hold up. I then questioned how my money got into this investment account that I never set up never put money into and never authorized. She told me the account was set when I opened checking. With this company I only asked for checking. I proceeded to ask to speak to a manager. I am placed on hold long enough for them to talk and I get a call come through it’s the manager. He places me on hold to hang up with representative. Which immediately I found shaky. I mean I know it’s Covid but most big companies have switch boards. I spoke with him and while speaking with him we discovered low and behold this account I never set up had the same exact last for numbers as the external debit card I requested my funds to go to. He acknowledged he saw this but couldn’t do anything because it went to another company and that he would initiate a liquidation. I then said I didn’t want that and wanted refund. I requested the company that had my money contact. He then said sorry that’s all the information I have and pretty much told me they would have my mon for 5-7 business days but he would start process. Fast forward to 10/26. I kept checking the site and low and behold the withdrawal button that was grey was now lit up and I hit withdraw because I want my money. I then called and was told my withdrawal started 10/26 I then asked to speak to supervisor same thing got a call same guy. He tells me they started withdrawal 10/26 I then became angry and told him what he told me he then said I see you filed a complaint with BBB I said yes because you are withholding my funds and giving me the run around. He then became very dry and as before said I would have to wait. I later went on website and was able to see where they were at which was the beginning. Now today I can’t see anything and I still do not have my money. They have put me in a major struggle with this and as soon as my funds are returned I’m closing this account and never coming back!

reviews: Moneylion does NOT release deposits when they are received, nor do they release SSI or SSA payments according to the calendar of any other "get paid early" card, such as NetSpend, Varo, Current, Ace Flair, Serve, or alike.  My other child's SSI goes to NetSpend and I received it over 24 hours ago, even though moneylion also uses Metabank.  They have been telling me it's "pending" and will be released any time between today, October 27th and November 1st.  Do NOT switch from NetSpend or similar, you will wait sometimes days longer for your deposit.

name: michelle
reviews: STAY AWAY FROM THIS COMPANY OR YOU WILL REGRET IT !!!!!!!Update 10/28/21After reply from Moneylion and using the link they provided to submit my information I received an email back stating I had used an outdated link to contact them and no other response has followed. Even the person responding to their reviews on here doesn't have the slightest idea of what is going on or what to do about it. I changed to the RoarMoney account because they said I would get paid 2 days early. I've been using Varo which does the same thing and would normally get my check today the 26th. I waited all day for my money and finally called to be told no I won't get it early it will be released on the 1st even though they have received it. When I complained they then say I will get it on the 30th which is Saturday. That's no earlier then a regular bank. All Monday deposits show up on Saturday morning. They lied about giving you it early. I will definitely be going back to my old bank varo. If I hadn't changed I would have my money right nowUpdate on 10/27: After reply by Moneylion I submitted the form to the link they provided. I will update again once I get a response.

reviews: I have been with Money Lion for a few years now and I have been very happy with them even with some bad experiences. After months of communicating with them about the situation they were finally able to get most of income to be recognized by the system. They are still working on one of them but they are caring and supportive of their customers and although they took a while to solve the problem they were persistent in their work. I have recommended Money Lion to my friends and family. Customer satisfaction is one of their strong points.

Now I am unable to work for the rest of the day and probably won't get to eat until the money is transferred to my bank account. It never even gave me the option on which account I wanted it to go into. I AM INCREDIBLY DISAPPOINTED AND WOULD LIKE BETTER CLARITY ABOUT WHERE THE FUNDS ARE GOING!!!

reviews: I've had a moneylion acct for a couple of yrs now and I only have 2 complaints. My ck is direct deposited into my ML acct each month but I am ineligible because I have no sign in credentials. So my choices are either just forget about trying to get a credit builder acct or change my direct deposit to a different bank...very frustrating. Would have been nice to know this info upfront! The only other issue I have is customer service is almost nonexistent. Therefore they only get 3 stars from me..

name: customer
reviews: Suddenly, the (free) regular delivery option for Instacash stopped working like it had in the past. It’s only giving me the option for instant delivery for $4.99. I chatted with a rep and called another, but they were both annoying, incompetent, unprofessional, and completely unhelpful. I did not get any email acknowledgement of a support ticket they supposedly raised. Then it gets worse. I call a third rep, and she says to check the agreement box and click confirm in order to get to a screen where I can choose my delivery option. I ask her if she’s sure that it won’t just immediately execute the Turbo delivery option and charge me $4.99. And that’s exactly what it did! She filed for a refund and gave me a reference number, but I haven’t received it yet not got anywhere close to getting my issue resolved. MoneyLion is The worst, hands down!
