name: courtney
reviews: Here's the thing with money lion. If you do not have good credit they do help build credit with the whole loan program, the only problem I have is that literally once you calculate up all the fees that they charge you every month for that loan you've paid $120 in membership fees for a year and I'd say about an extra 40 bucks for interest & for me I rather just use a credit card. My interest wasn't that high though because I made sure to pay more every time I made a payment to bring my interest rate down but even the instacash, I feel bad because they ask you to leave a tip but dang by the time you take out the little money they charge you $5 to put it on your own debit card if you put it on their debit card you still have to pay a $3 fee at an ATM plus a dollar fee to them for using an outside ATM which totals up to $4, shoot you might as well slap on the extra buck and put it on your own debit card. Once it's time to pay them back I've already hit $15 in fees so to me that's their tip right tthere They only allow you to take out $50 at a time and every single time you take out money instantly you must pay the fee for it so if someone is hurting bad and they need to hit insta-cash up for 300 bucks you are looking at $30 dollars in payback fees. THEY DO GIVE YOU A FREE OPTION WHICH TAKES ABOUT 2 TO 3 DAYS TO TRANSFER TO YOUR BANK SO IF YOU ALREADY KNOW THAT YOU WILL BE STRUGGLING FOR THE WEEK YOU CAN GO AHEAD AND DO THAT AHEAD OF TIME. I guess I appreciate the app overall which is why I'm giving them this review because they have helped me out in moments where I didn't know what I was going to do.

name: teresa
reviews: Do NOT use this "bank"!!!! They will steal all your money and not give it back! They froze my account due to a deposit from a ring I stopped making payments on... Made me send pictures of all the receipts of the payments I had made on the ring, then as soon as they unfroze my account.... ALL MY MONEY WAS GONE! I reported the fraud the second they unfroze my account but they continued to claim they had no records of my report! Now 2.5 MONTHS later.... They STILL have not returned MY MONEY! They also keep telling me "my supervisor will call you within the hour." And they never call you back.... Moneylion statements say that if an investigation into fraudulent charges takes longer than 10 days they will credit your account the amount you believe is due back to you so you don't have to go with it, but they will NOT do this! I am reporting MoneyLion to the FTC and I found a lawyer who will sue them and I don't have to pay a dime because this is now bank fraud that MoneyLion has committed! Please do NOT get trapped in MoneyLion!

reviews: Very easy and helpful banking and fast cash "instacash" for those times of need and short on funding  only down side I'd honestly say is when you do the instacash their is a "tip" area for getting the funds you want or need. They start with an automatic $5 and goes as low as $2 but goes higher than $5. If you choose the no tip option they send quick message on screen kinda makes you feel bad but they have a $3.99 service charge to get it instantly even tho it's called instacash that means to me you get it right then not pay $3.99 so you can get it right now and also have to leave a tip.  They say it's not free and they are right they get $3.99 when you get it right then and then  tip. I don't want to sound un-greatful but if your getting that money the your probably already in need and having some issues financially so every dollar kept is better for individual.  I appreciate this app and money lion more than you'd guess by this review but it said be honest so that's exactly what I am doing. I have chosen no tip before and I already fee extremely horrible for asking for help and then reading that message just made me feel even worse but then I was able to get the house hold Items needed for our kids and family so I just sucked it up bitter cup.  One day hopefully I'll be able to get ahead enuf that I'm squared away and won't need to do instacash and will be able to purchase more crypto instead also brings to next awesome point you can do investing with the app as platform for another app/platform and moneylion is just facilitating the safe space to allow you to invest as you wish  amazing features I have my S.O. hooked up now finally and am waiting for rest of my peoples to set up and get hooked up. The more they do the more insensitive they provide for me as well  AIRBORNE ALL THE WAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! THANK YOU MONEYLION 💰 🤑 💸 💲 🪙 💶 💰 🤑 💸 💲 🪙 💶 FEELS GOOD TO HAVE THIS SUPPORT ESPECIALLY DURING THESE TRYING TIMES WE LIVE IN AND LACK OF ABILITY TO HAVE EVERYONE AROUND LIKE PRE-COVID DAYS AND HELP IS JUST A CLICK AWAY  THANK YOU FOR YOUR TIME AND SERVICES TO US ALL WHO ARE BENEFITING FROM THE AVABILITY OF FINANCIAL SERVICES available to us in time of need. Awesomeness 👌 👌 👌 👏 👍💯🤙👌🤙💯👊💯🫀💪

reviews: Moneylion has been good and bad, as of late mainly terrible. I have been traveling a lot this summer, so I've had my fair share of pre-authorizations, I have used different debit cards that I own along the way, Moneylion has been by far the worst,they have had me waiting for up to 28 days for a release, even AFTER the hotel has sent over the authorization release and final bill. It's a joke, this morning I had a chat rep by the name of Joan waste over an hour of my time telling me she was releasing my funds specifically mentioning the amount and then only to be told after 45 minutes of waiting around for her that she was looking at the wrong document.

name: Britt
reviews: Moneylion from day one has been an awesome account to have! The instant cash has come in handy when I have been in a pinch and they have so many other options! From a creditbuilder loan, to buying crypto, invest your money and just forget about it and they will do the rest for you, but if that isn't what you want to do you have the option to manage the investment account on your own! Cashback deals and many other resources build for everyone and it doesn't matter what type of situation you are in! They have quickly helped me any time i have had questions and reached out to customer service! The only reason I didnt give 5 stars is because I have withdrawn money once in my investment account and I still havent seen it arrive in my account yet... I talked to someone but they might have misunderstood what i was asking and told me it would be 7 to 10 days before i would see it arrive.... I started the withdrawl on September 30th and its now October 12th... My other investment account takes me the 3 waiting days and my money is accounted for in my banking account. So that may need some improvment.. or im just unlucky and some issues happend that are going to be resolved hopefully soon... Other than that one complaint I think they have a really great concept and hope they keep adding more features to help people out especially people when they are in a bad spot and need some extra money for emergency situations!

name: TT
reviews: This company is a rip off.... they basically give you a loan for a large amount of money but put most of it in reserve. So you are paying on a loan that you didn't receive. Given an example, you get a loan for $1000 dollars but they only give you $300 and now you have to pay interest on a $1000 loan for 24 months. Now if you catch on to what they are doing and decide to pay the loan back. They will require you to pay $1000 dollars back and hold $700 of your money for 7 business days. This means they are holding money that you didn't even borrow. Do not get this loan. With that being said, I paid $48 out of pocket for a $300 loan for 2 weeks and in order to pay the $300 back I had to come up with $1000 and now they have been holding my funds for over a week. When I called they said I will have to wait another 7 days to get Money back that technically I didn't borrow and doesn't belong to them.

reviews: Although I do love being able to borrow money, I'm not a big fan of how to deposit the money. I don't like that it's only in $50 spurts and each time you request a loan you have to leave a tip. Although the tip option is "optional", each time you dont leave a tip the app essentially guilts you or it reminds you that you should tip. I feel like if you have the option to request a higher amount, your limit should be $100 each request. Not $50. I get the app is trying to make some money but having to tip each time is pretty wild. I would need $200 and end up paying $50 extra in tips and the turbo charges.

name: cj zamorano
reviews: Tried to close my account in Sept 2021, and just as before, their customer service is lukewarm garbage, practically non-existent. It took me forever to get a rep on the phone, through a maze of IVR menus and long pre-recorded messages, which I finally navigated to speak to a human. The rep is clearly reading from scripts, and has left me sitting on hold for at least 20 minutes (while we only interacted for about 2 minutes). He never even bothered to ask me why I'm closing my account. I requested full deletion from their database (per my legal rights as a US consumer); the rep cannot tell me exactly what personal information they'll be holding onto, after my deletion request. He referred me to their site's Terms and Conditions, which also do not state exactly what pieces of my personal information they'll be holding onto. So now I'm hold for a supervisor; the rep tried to get me to "wait for a call back from a supervisor within 24 hours" but I said no, I'll hold, because I know better than to think I can count on this company to follow up. It's been 10 minutes on hold waiting for an available supervisor, to tell me exactly what personal information of mine they'll be keeping - because that is not listed in the website's terms and conditions. We're in the age of identity breaches folks, and this "bank" that's now publicly traded, and farms out their support calls overseas, can't even tell you exactly what of your personal information they'll be keeping after you *try* to close your account (SS#? DOB? The ingredients for *another* identity breach, through a bank that's impossible to get ahold of on the phone?). Their website won't even let you change your address, or phone number. Stay far, far, far, away. Find a local credit union, or set fire to your hard-earned cash, because that's better than being bitten by MoneyLion. MoneyLion is not a bank; they should never have been given a license to do banking business in the US. It's a scam, to steal your money, waste your time, and pad the pockets of stockholders, thanks to their recent IPO. I feel sorry for anyone who has ever given them a dime of their money, or a minute of their time.Sept 2021 Update: After 65 minutes on the phone with the first rep, a supervisor finally called me from another line. She said they will be reviewing their IVR menu, and their policies for when a customer calls to cancel their account. I still say, stay far away from this publicly traded bank, because they're clearly not spending that IPO money on more call center staffing. Otherwise it wouldn't have taken me almost 75 minutes to get an answer that any local bank teller could have given me in 75 seconds.Original review on Play store, from fall 2019: Tried FOR MONTHS to verify my account to get their loan. I've lived in the same state my whole 47 years of life, & the same county for 23 years. They take a business week to turn around email requests. If you manage to get someone on the phone, they read off scripts and give you stock, unhelpful answers. Loan terms are ridiculous: 1) pay $20/mo for Plus; 2) Get a $500 loan - oh wait, now that you've got the loan, btw you only get $125 now, then pay us $900 over 2 years, then you get your other $375. So I paid off the $500 ASAP, and they waited 2 weeks to release the $375.

reviews: Money Lion was always a 5 star company since I started with in 2019. I have been a customer of money lion since 2019. The last loan I paid off I tried to re borrow it because I'm having a family emergency and I keep getting denied. I call customer service over the phone and I chat them online and they all tell me that they can't verify my income through my account or that my account isn't linked when I've linked it myself numerous times before reaching out to customer service. I feel like I'm getting the runaround every person I've talked to has given me a different reason as to why I can't borrow this loan. If the issue is my income, I get direct deposit.I receive $804 per week in income.  I'm constantly linking my account and all I'm getting is the run around.

name: misty smith
reviews: I previously wrote a positive review, however things have very much gone downhill since then, which is so frustrating because now I have to go through the hassle of finding a new bank! I’m in the market for a small business loan, and, trusting MoneyLion, I used the links listed in their “loans” section to choose providers. All but one was a link to a scam or spam, not actual lenders, but shady “middle man” type sites that ask for everything from your social to your bank account number, only to forward you to another “middle man” site. I went through the application process on one site only, that seemed ok, and I have been getting 20-30 spam emails since then. Apparently they sold my email address to advertisers. I am FURIOUS that MoneyLion would provide links to this type of thing. Obviously they can’t be trusted. So, as an alternative, I tried to apply for MoneyLion’s OWN loan program, the credit builder plus. My credit isn’t terrible, but could always be better. So why not? Because I can’t - why? BECAUSE I HAVE A MONEYLION ACCOUNT. I literally can not apply because my direct deposit and spending history is in a MoneyLion account, and they will only let you prove income banking history from an EXTERNAL bank. What in the world?? I called customer service to confirm this because it seemed absolutely insane, but was told point blank that I would need to open a new bank account, switch my direct deposit to that account, and then wait 60 days for the account to be considered “established” before I can apply for the loan. Something smells sketchy when they don’t trust their own accounts or their own members. So, off I go searching for a new account, AGAIN. The second star is because they used to be so awesome :(

Thanks Moneylion, for seeing me through my financial needs when I've needed them ! It's a really big thing to me !! For people whom weren't brought up in families of a brother sister mother father setting, where are we to go-to in times of needs. Im sure im spesking for most folks also same being as to those whom have larger family for those who was just not asking for the help of others as auch, app's like Moneylion are, and do become like family to us i guess. Strang , but , true...So yeah A huge thank you Moneylion for being there for those of us in our times of need, & , simply being there for us like you shown thus far. You actually mean a lot evwn more than you know !! But,You could possibly be the very reason that someone made it into work that week and are reasons of them still holding on to their job being able too keep food on their table and their utilities kept going.. So for the little extra money you lend , you could possibly have turned a life arround for themselves. Like i said for some of us without you we woukd have none other ootiins periode. Speaking for many i believe...

reviews: This service has been beneficial in the past but I had a horrible experience last week. My payday was wrong in the system. I called to request to defer my due date by about 10 days. Fast forward 2 days later I haven't gotten a call but an email thanking me for my payment. The money I had in my account was for a tow, my car is not working so now I have to wait for my next paycheck. When I called customer service about the payment that I was assured was not going to be withdrawn, the review # was not attached to my account and they had no record of a payment deferral. Very disappointing and irritating to say the least.

name: Shawn Hall
reviews: Was scared to get spammed by loan sharks because of another bad experience with another “cash boost app” giving my loan information to every shady loan company. However, money lion has a good rep as a banking system so I’m grateful to have it. It’s similar to Brigit, Dave, and Earnin, but money lion does have $5 fee per $50 for instant transfer. Brigit has no fees but only lets you have $140. Solo is cool if you need more cash but suggests 7% tip to the app and 7% to the individual loaning the money.

name: Travis Craycraft
reviews: This is an UPDATE to my 1st Review - I was really loving and enjoying MoneyLion until recently they temporarily suspended my RoarMoney Checking Account due to a transfer that "I" made. I was transferring money to a relative that was in dire need. They did this for Security reasons. I understand that but what I don't understand is why they could not be like other Banks that send you a text or email and ask "Did you make this transaction?" instead of immediately suspending it. I had to fax them a copy of my Driver's License and a Billing Statement showing my proof of Address. I did this a few weeks ago. The first time I emailed it to them, I found out their Customer Service gave me the incorrect Email Address. The second time I emailed it to the correct Email Address was last Tuesday, 8/24 and until today 8/30 my account is still suspended and I can't even access my own paycheck that was directly deposited on Wed, 8/25, which is very unfair. I have bills to pay and I can't pay back my InstaCash due to this and MoneyLion is saying I am late. I would not have been late if they had not suspended my account for making a transfer on it. It was me and their process is ridiculous. I was a very pleased Customer until this happened. I can't buy food or groceries, I am starving right now. Thanks MoneyLion.

name: christina
reviews: I have been waiting for over a week for a ticket to be resolved over my credit builder loan that I have never missed a payment on but says I have due to my 4 year old accidentally pushing the pay off button. and it now has my instacash disabled that my family uses greatly since we just had our baby boy a month a half early. I called when I said what happened a immediately and customer service said they would submit a ticket stating the accident and have it put back on to my regular payments and it would open up my instacash again. But  a week later when my deposit hit they took the full amount of what I owed for instacash which is fine but my instacash wasnt reopened cause they still hadnt fixed the problem the credit builder loan payments.  Meaning my family doesnt have the extra funds that may be required from time to time for no fault of my own. I called support again today and of course they said there was still no response about the ticket and that maybe I should call back next wenesday and they couldnt open my instacash again until they fixed the error. I have been with money lion for several years now and I have never missed any payments whether its membership fees instacash repayments or credit builder loan payments. I have a steady income deposited every two weeks. and even stuck it out when they apparently issued my account number to someone else also (this is exactly what the representative told me) and they stole over 700 everything my family had at places in India.) and it took money lion weeks to issue credit for the clearly stolen money. Ive stuck it out when customer representatives have been rude and hung up on me, and refused to help with issues. Ive always been greatly appreciative of the services offered by money lion. But their timing it takes to respond to support tickets that can greatly effect their customers ability to pay their bills and feed their children. Please fix this soon. My payments are not missed and I have been a loyal customer for years.

name: Patrick O
reviews: Not the bank they promised when they started. They opened saying they were a easy bank that was about the customer. In truth they seemed to be that but with each year all those promises went away. All those programs changed or were no longer offered. It was a typical bait and switch. Besides the bait and switch the fact customer service is impossible to get hold off is my biggest complaint. They lie and it's the simple truth. When you wait at least 2 hrs to speak with a person, by the way never do the call back feature it never happens, but when you reach a person they will say they are opening a case. They say they will be in touch when the area expert looks into the issue. Well sometimes 5 minutes later or 2 days later or two weeks later it's always the same. You get an email saying the case is closed. When you call And wait 2+ hrs again they tell you the case was closed because they weren't able to reach you for help on the issue. The funny thing is they can send a "closed" email about the case but you never receive a call or email about the actual problem. It's brutal and always a B's way to close a case they had zero intention to actually try and resolved. Just not the bank it once was, gain typical bait and switch.

reviews: The cash advance limit was not fixed, and I never got a call back. I was promised a 1000$ cash advance limit and it was yanked away at $625. name: sharon
reviews: Been using this app for a few years now. Never any problems. Pretty straightforward with a couple features i really like, roundup and instacash.Roundup rounds every purchase up to the nearest dollar and deposits that amount in a designated account. I'm horrible at saving and this makes it invisible to me (mostly).Instacash is their payday loan feature. No interest. Very convenient. One thing they did which i DON'T LIKE is limit transfers to $50. So say i qualify for 200 instacash, now i can only get at it in $50 chunks. And if i want that $50 chunk instantly (of course i do), then i have to pay the associated fee. And if i want 100 at once, that'll be 2 separate transactions. Each with their own fee.

name: maria
reviews: Money Lion is truly a pioneer especially in the industry they're in, to loan money to a person like myself who has had some financial mishaps and sub-par credit scores during my membership with the Instacash funding source while and is truly unique to the brand alone.  They literally strip it back down to basics and believe that if you're generating an income of some sorts you should be entitled to a small-sizeable advance and that's on the basis of trust, honesty and hard work.  Those are morals you'll see across the board on the MoneyLion app as they have essentially become a better way of banking for "the people" and I just find that very reputable,  rather convenient and ultimately the type of financial institution I want to do future business with.  Strong Morals, Education,  one of a kind tools and resources all continue to assist in my interest and bond with the company an it sort of becomes a scenario after actively seeing the way MoneyLion interacts with their customer base where you're both finding one another united in these struggles together,  you're experiences of the good times are also joined side by side with them the whole way through, for better or worse and after all isn't that the way its suppose to truly be?

name: Anthony
reviews: I can see how it would be an incredible app. I did the insta cash option because I needed some money before I get paid I was approved for $190! But with this app you can only transfer $50 at a time!! There is a fee and a tip that is charged every time you advance $50 to get to the total amount you were approved for! In my opinion that's just greedy and it's a very poor business practice to kick people when they're already down!

I LIKE THAT MONEYLION INCREASES YOUR AVAILABLE INSTANT CASH AMOUNT WITH EACH ON TIME REPAYMENT.  OVERALL, IT SEEMS TO BE A SAFE; SECURE APP TO BORROW MONEY AS NEEDED.One thing that could be modified, is to allow an $100.00 Instant Cash transaction with one Turbo fee ; instead of having to do two separate $50.00 transactions that results in two Turbo fees being applied.

reviews: There’s a lot of features that MoneyLion offers that is very beneficial to users. There’s the credit builder loan which reports your payments to the credit bureaus thus helping your credit score improve. There’s also instacash which works similar to other apps like Dave and Earnin. The reason I give 4 and not 5 stars is because the features for paying your loan payments are limited and if you ever fall behind a payment, they don’t offer the option to make a partial payment which could be beneficial depending on a persons situation. It’s a lot easier for someone to catch up by making small payments versus making one larger payment.

name: neo
reviews: I was scammed by a fake moneylion account on Instagram and am being targeted by more like it, on top of that moneylion charged me twice and is not only refusing to give it back but they're trying to hold me responsible even tho I have proof of this and now they've locked me out of my moneylion account! Also even tho I was being as civil as I could be one of their customer support agents just hung up on me! I'm beyond upset, I'm homeless and live in a women's shelter in Portland and I've been thru hell I don't need this! Moneylion you are crooks!.... ² So it just takes a bad review to get your attention? Why didn't you just say so? Ok, first of all victim shaming is not only SUPER classy but professional as well! And u now suggest I reach out thru your social media for help? You've GOT to be f**king joking right? Ok sure, which one of your Instagram accounts should I try, there's only 40 or 50 at least? Should I try messaging the one where "moneylion" claims I've won $2021 or should I try the one that called me a goat and said such vulgarity it should belong in a porn mag? I take responsibility for being naive and not thinking on this one but with as many fake profiles these ppl have made I know this can't be the first you've heard of this and there's got 2 b more victims.Also i DID reach out to both you & Instagram to get help with this but nothing! There's no such thing as REAL live support anymore! I had always paid back apps on time and was hoping to raise my credit score so that I could put a roof over my head and get my mom and I an apartment together but instead I've had to borrow again right after paying them all back just to pay all the motels I've had to stay bcuz I had nowhere 2 go and bcuz the shelters here in Portland are overloaded unless I wanted to pitch a tent out here downtown and there's just so many of the mentally ill homeless that no one cares about one more, there was just no help just like now, there's only greed and blaming and pretty much just "oh well you're screwed lady hope u learned your lesson!" I've been so stressed I lost my hair and am now super thin and was in fear of being less than a day away from the streets where it's more like an insane asylum for ppl who took too many drugs and now this bs? Yeah I was gullible and desperate but the links and messages looked pretty legit just like the real Moneylion so they did their homework,guess i shoulda just did mine or at least remembered to change my login info immediately but I didn't, so in a nutshell moneylion are you saying that I deserved this? Let me know and in the meantime I hope that $205 that you wrongfully took from me is doing more for you than it could've for me since I've been broke since before I even woke up on payday, without a damn cigarette to calm me down or unable to buy food when I work late and miss dinner at the women's shelter, no, not a bunch of made up bs this is %100 truth and idk how hard you have to work for your $ but I'm a housekeeper at a residential home for the disabled so what I do IS  hard work therefore I shouldn't have had to beg you for my own money back or my bank to hurry up with their "provisional" money that I still have yet to receive or for you to at least let me get an Instacash loan that someone else got to cash in on from MY loyalty and on time payments that I earned! It's almost like you're siding WITH the bad guys,except to me you're one of them also! And great customer service btw,speaking of your rep just hanging up on me for being angry yet in a civil manor demanding answers? And because I had to change my debit card,now all my other payday apps have encountered more bugs they need to fix,they all started me over even tho my accounts still the same and charging me  new member fees again so I was looking at a $10 advance from other apps I use like DAVE when used to be $100! God Bless the good ppl from Earnin, they're truly #1! They are always so quick 2 help and fix my issues, they raised my max rather than decrease it like Cleo, Dave and KLOVER who just snatched up the $10  i had borrowed and b4 I even got across street to buy lunch at work it was gone and wasn't even due till TOMORROW! trust them folks to ever get your payback date correct EVERYTIME, double check! Am I bitter? Yes, do I sound a little bit like someone who's snapped? Yup! U would too if you've been in my shoes not to mention that my bank Rivermark CCU who has done everything they can to assure they get at least 1 to 2 $30 overdraft fees outta me each pay period even when the apps have a different post date they push em on thru anyways so that they can charge me for it which in hence is making me look irresponsible and likely to keep me and mom homeless even longer so thanks for the HELP Moneylion,Instagram,Rivermark! You got my referrals! 👍_In Instagram Type moneylion in searchbar to 👀 and I got screenshots to prove it all if anyone's interested in helping me stop them!

name: DeCarlos
reviews: This is by far the best of the few apps like this available right now. I love the variety of services available and set up was a breeze. I gave only three stars due to the fact that the Insta cash feature is deceivingly expensive. Zero APR is true however the other fees associated set an actual APR over 500%.First time I used this feature cash was instantly deposited into my bank account for a fee And deposits are capped at $50 regardless of amount available to you I’m assuming to charge you an additional fee. Tips are not required but changing the default tip Will take a couple of attempts if you’re not paying attention you will pay an automatic high tip amount. The second time I used this feature after having set up a money roar account Money was deposited into that account not my bank making the instant part useless and a waste of money for the additional fees since it takes two days to transfer to your bank. To summarize great app highly recommend it is slightly expensive and does need some fine-tuning.

name: james
reviews: Absolutely the worst ever. Do not use their credit builder ("credit blower" is more like it) product When you pay it off they automatically send a late pay to all 3 credit bureaus! Twice this happened to me causing a combined hit of over 120 points to my score and erasing all my hard work over 12 month period during a pandemic and economic downturn no less!!! I believed them the first time when they said it was a system glitch and took them up on the second offer. Nope! It happened like clockwork again when I paid off the loan. I have filed complaints with the federal government, CFPB, OCC, Texas Attorney General office as this a blatant violation of UDAAP. This has cost me thousands of dollars and housing approvals! Moneylion is scamming people and forcing them to stay in a certain credit tier. Investigate Rohit Chopra! Predatory lender. AVOID!

name: Elizabeth Woods
reviews: It’s a great emergency service however the fees are a bit excessive when using the instant cash feature. To use instant cash you can borrow in increments of $5- $50 until you reach the max they have for you. When you borrow you tip them “the amount you think is fair” with the automatic defaults tip is $5, but you can alter it to any amount including $0. However when you do select $0 you get to a screen that says you didn’t tip and it requests that you leave a tip. They provide you with a card to use for instant cash and adding direct deposits, but there’s a charge of $3.99 to have the instant cash funds transferred to that card (in addition to the tip). Example- borrow $50 + $5 default tip+ $3.99 transfer to the card they provide fee. Repayment amount = $58.99)You can also transfer the money to your personal debit card for $4.99. The transfer fees don’t exist if you transfer to you checking account but that takes a few business days to arrive and in an emergency you need funds quicker than that.

reviews: Great experience with MoneyLion. I have to admit everything about this app has been positive. Ease of use and very intuitive layout. name: Omer Iqbal
reviews: The customer service is deplorable bordering on fraudulent. I had a credit builder loan payment due on June 28th. I got paid on June 23rd and wanted to get all of my bills paid. I scheduled a payment. Suddenly it’s brought to my attention that my June Auto Payment was still scheduled to come out on June 28th automatically and the June payment I scheduled to pay early on June 23rd is scheduled to come out the next day on June 29th. When I spoke to customer service they told me they couldn’t cancel a pending payment. After it cleared my account is listed as past due. I paid my June 28th payment. I don’t understand how I can be past due when my next payment was due July 28th. Customer Service tells me that I have no payments scheduled for July. They say I had a payment due June 28th and 29th. Which is ridiculous. I looked over my loan agreement which clearly states 1 payment a month on the 28th. I can not be late for a payment that is not due for another 23 days from today. My instacash has been paused due to a missed payment that I didn’t miss. My good standing has been destroyed because I made a payment early NOT LATE early. There is literally no bank, heck there’s no good company in the world that wouldn’t correct this mistake in a second. It’s easy to see I did try to pay my July payment before my June payment. Agents are telling me I never had a July payment scheduled so they can’t change it. Again, my loan agreement states 1 payment due monthly on the 28th of the month. This is criminal. I will be contacting the BBB and my attorney if it’s not corrected.

name: Shadrick
reviews: Overall, I’ve been happy with all the features of MoneyLion. I use Chime for my bill pay since I started out with it first, and then found out about MoneyLion. It has plenty of excellent features, including tips on building your credit, third party loan offers, credit score checks, investment portfolios, and of course the great Instacash, and more.  But I’ve found them to not be consistent with how they work the due date or the amount of the loan on that. On July 2, for instance, I borrowed $50, and it didn’t even surprise me when the due date was July 2. I just rolled my eyes in my head thinking here we go again. It does no good to message them because they always have some technical reason for why it’s done what it did, and you gotta live with it, like it or not. However, I tried again later and it did what it’s supposed to do, due date next month when I get paid.  Last month it was so messed up I tried to get them to explain to me why the due date is due only a few days later instead of when I get paid on the first and I never did understand the person’s reasoning, I think they’re trained to talk so techie that you just have no room to argue and have to accept it. I did get them to move the due date to the 28th, since we get our check two days early.  Shouldn’t MoneyLion know they get my direct deposit two days early each month?  You’d think.  But my dd didn’t come in on the 28th and I thought it was rude of them to pull what payment they could out of Chime (I didn’t have the full amount in Chime at that time of the month). Them doing that caused a transaction from a lender to be declined from insufficient funds. I do feel that since MoneyLion knows exactly when they receive my monthly dd, they could’ve been more respectful and waited for it to arrive rather than take what money they could get out of my other bank, causing me stress. The bottom line though, MoneyLion has many helpful and excellent features for the consumer, and in my opinion, they need to work on consistency with the Instacash feature so as to prevent all the unnecessary stress for the consumer.

name: John Haulotte
reviews: Fast and reliable, I would recommend to anyone. Thank you MoneyLion!

name: Ebony Collins
reviews: Somebody changed the phone number on my account and then made a bunch of insta cash advances of $100 and then paid it back using my linked debit card and then took out a bunch more advances and then did that once more. Over $1700 in advances were made and over a thousand dollars of it repaid from my checking account. I called and reported this right as I saw it. After getting off the phone with the support lady I saw an email that said the phone number on my account 585-540-0923 was used to connect to a different account and was then disconnected from my account. I told the lady on the phone several times that that was NOT my phone number. So why, after I reported this was this phone number allowed to connect to another account?! How is that now flagged as suspicious activity?I have so many questions. After this person changed the phone number and then immediately after started making instacash withdrawals, why wasn’t that flagged as suspicious activity? And after they paid back the advances and then made MORE advances, why was that not flagged as suspicious activity? When they used all of the advanced funds to make two large purchases from a place in Hong Kong WHY WAS THAT NOT FLAGGED AS SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY? When they changed the phone number on my account, why didn’t I get an email? Why was there no two step authentication? I need answers. They took everything.

name: justun
reviews: Charging $5 for instacash isn’t free.  Asking for a tip when charging $5 is crazy.  Making me request $50 at a time makes it expensive.Reply from MoneyLionAn hour agoInstacash funding is FREE if you choose standard delivery, which takes only 24-48 hours. If you need your Instacash extra fast, you can choose instant Turbo funding for $4.99 (or $3.99 if you have our RoarMoney bank account). The Turbo fee is totally optional and just helps us cover the cost of delivering your cash advance instantly when you’re in a pinch. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.Instant Cash isn’t instant if you have to wait 2 business days.  It would be 2 business day cash.  The cast for instant payments through a debit card is .50 cents.  You charge $4.99.  I do enjoy the service. I would rate it 5 stars and recommend it to all of f my family and friends if I would choose how much I needed up to my instant cash limit.  I would be willing to tip every single time if the fee wasn’t already profitable for money lion.  You are close to having a great product.  All your doing now is limiting your growth and popularity while letting someone create a service to directly compete with you and make it theirs.  All cabs and ride shares are called Uber now.  All tissue is called Kleenex.  You could own the instant cash market.  Lyft did economy ride share first.  Uber came up with Uber x as a response.  Now it’s all referred to as ubering by the consumer.  Good luck city and thank you for helping me out.

name: chad
reviews: MoneyLion overall is a very resourceful and helpful tool to have in emergencies, however, the fees are outrageous. You have to pay a processing fee for every amount you withdraw, not to mention, MoneyLion claims tipping is optional but if you choose not to tip for an amount you withdraw, the next time you try to borrow money, a screen will pop up stating you didn’t leave a tip the last time and it forces you to tip the company before you’re able to withdraw more money. The company shouldn’t claim that tipping is optional when you really don’t have a choice. I pay about an additional $70-$80 every week due to processing fees and tips and that is absolutely ridiculous.In response to MoneyLion’s reply: Nobody wants to wait 2 days for standard delivery because nobody takes out a payday loan unless it is for an immediate emergency. And you are 1000% lying about optional tipping, there was no way for me to exit out of that prompt without leaving you all a tip (the prompt literally said, “Whoops, looks like you didn’t leave us a tip last time. Tipping allows us to continue to deliver your funds with 0%APR.” with a button at the bottom of the screen FORCING me to tip $3). I’ve already gone back and forth with one of your employees about this as well as how you give incorrect dates of when money will be deposited into your RoarMoney account (screenshots were provided for this). I use to work in the payday/installment loan industry and it’s behaviors like the ones your company displays that has made these loans illegal in my state.

name: Shawn Avery
reviews: If i could give moneylion a zero or less, I'd give it a negative 5. There's absolutely no customer service just a call center rep that reads prompts and tey and get a supervisor is another joke all in its own. CB loans are advertised as .05% apr or even 0% but that is a negavtive youre charged more for the loan plus in order to get a loan you only receive 10%of until its paid off then have to wait an additional two weeks to even be released to you, you also have to pay for a 19.99$ membership fee for services you already receive if you set up direct deposit. Oh and dont het me started with their false advertisement of getting paid two days early what a joke. And the instacash you do not geyvup to 250$ just because of direct deposit thats a membership fee as well to get the 250$ although you have your direct deposit set up with them. If you have any irregualr deposits made to your account like a friend transferring you money that will make their incapable and unreliable system lose any type of deposit information its ever received from you and its like basically starting iver to recieve instacash again. Its an elementary bank with no customer service or even an IT department to help correct with the incorrect deposits the system lables them as. Ive had nothing but trouble with this bank and the getting paid two days early was only valid for the first two months i started banking with them ever since i have not gotten paid two days early and its been seven months now. Im now just waiting on my direct deposit transfer back to chime because they actually honor what they advertise. Wish i would've never switched.

name: crystal
reviews: Highly recommend avoiding this business at all cost!They’ve locked me out of my account for days, are allowing charges to go through on a card that is supposed to be frozen and telling me it’s active on their end, and couldn’t give me an answer as to why that is when it shows locked on my end.On another occasion, I spoke with a representative who informed me she was issuing a dispute on unauthorized transactions. I called back a few days later and was told a dispute was never created.I’ve also tried checking into hotels on 2 separate occasions and had my card declined both times because the charge was more than ITV was supposed to be. On both occasions, MoneyLion representatives have told me it was the merchant holding the extra money. Each time the merchant showed me exactly what they were charging, and in one instance they even spoke with the MoneyLion representative themselves and were told the same thing.I finally filled a BBB complaint, and the response given by the business was that they do, in fact, hold an extra 20% on charges like hotels and restaurants. Had I been accurately informed the first time this happened I could have planned for it the second time around.This also happened once in a drivethru when I was paying for food, and I had no idea why it was being declined at the time because there was enough in the account to cover my order, but apparently not their extra 20%.

name: william
reviews: I have been using Money Lion for around 4 months now and my experience has been beyond rewarding. I started out making a few cash advances from my own paychecks for some tight situations. I decided to look into opening an account with them for banking and that allows me to get my paycheck 2 days early. I have also joined a program called credit builder plus. I was given a account with $1000 in it and was allowed to use $125 of it. I get the rest when i have paid the full loan. The time from payment 1 to the end its reported on my credit as making on time payments and that is what i need the most help with.. They also offer investment options. Im in that as well and can't wait to see how well i do. There is many other opportunities they offer and if anyone is interested look them up and see what they offer. Im happy and proud that i did.

I love the auto investing and the options for investing, the new round ups and double round ups investment feature, and I'm super excited they have a crypto feature coming as well!

name: William Phinney
reviews: I don’t even know what to say, other then Thank you you turned a very scattered, Emotional week into one I will literally never forget 💜I downloaded money lion about a year ago but at the time unfortunately my bank was not a supported bank with them(Chime) Well that other day I was really down and out while looking on Google Chime support of banks for a payday loan and I noticed that come up again and clicked because I remember that time I was at an option for this app but for some reason I clicked it and let me tell you I am so grateful so beyond happy that I did because he definitely added so many different banks that are not eligible as well as mine chime. I want to say it took me a total of 10 minutes, between re-downloading the app, filling out all the necessary information Name, DOB, address, email, you know all that lovely stuff every other site has to ask lol. You have to link a ACTIVE debt card along with the cards account to prove you have a regular income source coming in.Yes, Michigan Unemployment is totally acceptable:) I want to say it took 30 seconds to verify my bank account, Make sure my income is Consistent. Once it said I was approved I noticed I had a $50 dollar Instacash waiting for me whenever I needed it, The best part is once I asked for it it was in my linked bank account in less than a minute. Look I pretty much probably no it’s not bragging about the bank in this review on writing is probably just going to continue to grow because the cash advances not even close of the most amazing stuff that they have that they offer two of us. All I Gotta say is download the app sign up check it out yourself, and enjoy a new bank that makes you just want to Brag because they are amazing 😂😂💜💜Love;DWilson 🤓🤓💜

name: Jason Lovelace
reviews: I am so glad I found Money Lion. If I need a few bucks ahead of time before getting my monthly check from the VA, and they see proof that I receive monthly deposits, then Boom! It's all good, and they will send it right to my account. They give you a decent amount to work with as well. Not just a measly $20 like a Float Me. It is your choice to pay a fee to get it instantly or wait a few days to avoid the fee. Once you build trust with them by borrowing some cash and paying back what you borrowed, when you said you would on payday, then all kinds of other benefits start to open up. This includes the ability to borrow a larger sum of money than what was previously fronted to you, as well as some other lending and banking features. The only thing i would say I wish was different, would be to increase the available amount to request each time. Especially if you are trying to get more than just $50. Each time if you want it instantly (lets face it, most people either do want it fast or they really do need it fast) there is a fee to instantly receive your cash in basically minutes (for some it could possibly take a few hours). I think a good system would be, if you leave a tip of a certain amount, then the fee gets waived. It's a business and totally understandable that these people need and want to make their money, so I definitely get it. Like maybe a fee for every $100 would be a bit more reasonable. Regardless of that, I still give Money Lion 5 stars. Thanks guys.

name: Shane Taylor
reviews: I’m less than 3 months in to my second loan, on autopay, and current.  I was notified by multiple sources this weekend that I was reported 30 days late by MoneyLion even though I’m current and this current status also reflects current/never late on their app.   I had immediately disputed the error with Transunion then reached out to MoneyLion ‘support’ where I have lost all hope.  They won’t confirm my current status, acknowledge an error,  or even offer to look into it, they only send a link to dispute with Transunion and say they need 30 days.  They only respond with templates, and since I’ve asked to be escalated to a manager, my complaint has been ignored since.  I don’t usually write reviews like this, but this kind of credit reporting error is very harmful and in my case, totally random and false.  Plus, they know I’m current. Obviously, if a customer is stating something is wrong when they’re in good standing, they should do the right thing and assure me that they are working to fix this. Instead, I’m left to agonize. The ‘Credit Builder Loan’ has become a credit destroyer.  Please beware.

reviews: MoneyLion has saved my bacon a few times. I use the instacash option quite frequently. They let me take $350/pay period. They also have an option to take out a loan through them. I got approved for $500. The downfall is that they only gave me $100 upfront and will give me the other $400 after I pay it off. Also, you can only take out $50 at a time through instacash and you "should" pay a tip on every single one of those transactions. It can add up quickly. Of course you do not have to "tip" on those, but that is how MoneyLion helps people out. My advice tho: do not rely on this service. It can catch you in a debt cycle with them.

name: rosanne
reviews: I give MoneyLion 4 Stars because it has helped me get the cash I needed in desperate times when I had no other options. The only thing that I wish was different is the amount you can borrow at a time. I had $160 available that I could borrow but the max amount you can choose at a time is $50. If I needed to I could immediately choose to get another $50 out, and so on until the $160 available was reached. Only negative aspect is the $4.99 it charges you each time you choose to borrow money. When I borrowed $160 I ended up paying back over $179. Despite the money they tax you to borrow money its still a very useful and helpful app especially when you absolutely need money now.

name: Gia Sava
reviews: My Roar money account was closed and support is almost non existent. There was mention of suspicious activity and now they are stating that I violated my deposit agreement. They returned an electronic transfer from a Hardship withdrawal from my companies retirement plan. The Deposit agreement states that there is no limits on deposits from a 3rd party. Even if there was it was only $7400 to help pay medical bills and a few other bills that I have accrued during the pandemic(my wife is deaf and recently had surgery as well as being unable to work because she relies on reading lips mostly). Customer service was atrocious, uncaring, and vague. I have been a customer for several years and bought in to their features such as shaking your phone for cash back rewards(.05 cents for $800) or the free cash advance that they will only let you take in $50 increments and charge $3.99 if you want the "instacash" instant then they repeatedly ask for tips and show you pictures of people pouting. Let's do the bath $3.99 plus $2-5 tip on 50 bucks=$5.99 to 8.99. I was also told that I would not be refunded any of my money that is currently in my account which thankfully is only $8.40 but honestly it would be nice to eat this weekend even if it's Ramen noodles. I have been treated better by cash advance places. Seriously if you can take your money to any other bank do it.

name: Ryan Speer
reviews: I've had my account with these folks for almost 3 years now and they were Excellent with direct deposits and instacash before they switched to Roarmoney! Now when I REALLY need and depend on my instacash advance they LOCK me out after I've paid back my prior advance. Now all of a sudden saying "IT cannot detect that I get direct deposit?" CRAZY! How is this when I've had same employer and direct deposit going in for the past 3 years and nothing has changed😡 So freaking pissed! I had utilities scheduled to come out my account today and now all they left me with is $8 in my account. No Heads up that Instacash wasn't going to be available so I could have made other arrangements. NO NOTHING! THEY'RE TELLING ME THEY DON'T KNOW WHAT HAPPENED.??? How Not???? This is a WHOLE BANK AND THEY DON'T KNOW WHATS GOING ON WITH THEIR PRODUCT??? AND DON'T EVEN GIVE THE CONSUMER A HEADS UP???? THIS IS NOT GOOD BUSINESS PRACTICE AT ALL...VERY DISAPPOINTED CUSTOMER..NOT TRUST WORTHY FOLKS HERE..I WILL BE CLOSING MY ACCOUNT WITH THEM ASAP! SECOND TIME THEY'VE DONE THIS SINCE SWITCHING TO ROARMONEY MONEY..GARBAGE!!!!🤮👎👎👎👎👎

name: annemarie
reviews: MoneyLion allowed an identity thief to take out a loan using my information.  I only learned about it when a delinquent payment appeared (and negatively impacted) on my credit report.  I have tried to report this and have found direct communication with the company’s fraud department impossible  It continues to remain unresolved after three phone calls with customer services reps who can do nothing (without the fraud department) and reports filed with the company. This company does not check credit profiles and does everything online basically making it a target for identity thieves.  They are a poorly run company and do very little to resolve issues like this where an innocent person has been harmed by their careless policies.SO MoneyLion just gave me the same BOT generated response to my issue.  They sent me that response in response to the same complaint on another website.  I did what MoneyLion asked providing more information online DIRECTLY to them and got no acknowledgement that they received it and OF COURSE NO RESPONSE FROM THEM.  This company sucks and am so frustrated.  They are truly truly unprofessional.  If I could give them less than 1 star I would.I wanted to provide an update on this complaint.  I have yet to hear from the Fraud Department (I don’t understand this) but I did get a response from a customer advocate at MoneyLion in response to this post and another post at the Better Business Bureau.  He said that they did confirm that the loan WAS fraud.  That I have no financial responsibility for it and that they have started the process of removing the loan from the credit agencies records.  I guess I am suppose to be happy about this and I do feel somewhat relieved but I still feel violated.  I will be happy when the records are corrected at the credit agencies and the harm that has been caused to my credit rating is undone. I will then remove the complaint from the Better Business Bureau  In the meantime I am surprised that the original complaint to the fraud department has NOT been answered by them.  Maybe they sent the communication to the person who took out the loan fraudulently or maybe there is an error in my email address.  I don’t know.  It would be terrific if the consumer advocate (whom I appreciate) who responded could inform the fraud department I have not gotten their official communication and let them know the correct email address  to send it to.

name: tia
reviews: This is a great app. Lots of different ways to save and invest your money. It can be a little overwhelming with how many different loan and many saving tricks they provide. Lots of options to help guide you to getting a personal loan. I have not qualified for a MoneyLion loan but they connected me to several different loan companies that they are partnered with. I mostly use the MoneyLion app for the instacash feature. It has helped me on more than one occasion when I was low on funds and in between pay days. The only thing's I dislike about the instacash feature, no matter if you qualify for $200 instacash advance, they only allow you to advance money in $50 increments, each time you advance they ask for a tip between $0-$5 dollars. If you don't tip, they try and guilt you into leaving one, with a pop up picture of a little girl with a sad face, her hand out, and the words "Are you sure you don't want to leave NO Tip??" They charge a $4.99 Turbo fee if you want your cash deposited instantly to your debit card or bank account. It's $3.99 if you want it deposited to your MoneyLion debt card. They also offer the standard 2-3 business days delivery method, free. It's a good a great app easy to navigate. I just think it's a little absurd to only allow instacash with draws in $50 increments and charging fees and tips each time you make your $50 max with draw. Several other apps I use either charge a $9.99 flat monthly subscription fee, on qualified instacash withdrawals. Or they allow you to withdrawal entire qualified advance amount for a small fee to receive instantly.

reviews: Money Lion has the best/easiest credit building platform which is substantially helping me re-build my credit. They also have a great advance platform as well which includes “boosts” which are increases in the limit that one is allowed to advance. The ONLY negative Money Lion feature that I can say I’m not fond of is the way their advances are disbursed. (Ex. ML boosts increases your advancement limit to $200 and you’d like to borrow the full amount.. now you can withdraw that $200 in full but the way they have “advances” set up is max. $50 increments at a time. you can withdraw that $200 in 4 increments of $50 one after another immediately.. so you make 4 $50 requests meaning your to pay 4 tips and 4 fees.) i believe Money Lion members who pay $19.99/mo for membership should be able to withdraw their full advancement amount in one transaction. Regardless, I’m a huge fan of Money Lion and they’ve gotten me out of some ruts, and are helping me to improve my credit score. 5 Stars for ML

reviews: It's great if you need money in a pinch, and the investment portfolio's and credit builder loans are awesome. But for the instant cash you can't even take out limit. You have to do it in segments and each segment charges a fee for turbo and they strongly suggest tipping them.. however there are tons of things you can do and the have whole lists of opportunities to make/get/borrow/earn money! Suffice to say I have been enjoying my Moneylion account and it's freedoms and perks along with it! Thanks Moneylion!!

name: ashley
reviews: I've been using money lines insta cash for the past 4 months along with credit builder Plus and roar money. I move my direct deposit to my checking there and paid everything on time. So I make my instash payment for the month and then go to try and use it well my limit have been cut in half and the payment was made on the due date and was not late. So anyways it was cut in half and I couldn't figure out why well after a little research I find that there's no proof of any of my direct deposits so it was like I was a new customer again. So I call Mr Cash to try and figure out why and if they can somehow and pretty much got told that that's how it is and maybe next month well that doesn't really fix the fact that I was really kind of depending on that oh and my repayment date had gotten changed also and was two weeks from the long day instead of the normal. I have been a pretty good customer and have paid quite a bit of money in fees and tips just last month was 65 I think in fees and tips anyways I don't think that was very fair of them at all and if it was the other way around they wouldn't accept me telling them to just pretty much deal with it and I sent a complaint email and haven't heard anything yet and I'm sorry but just not at all impressed at all and will probably end up moving all my stuff to a different bank because of it so that's my thoughts on money line in insta cash

name: tracy
reviews: Money Lion insta-cash has been a life saver for me!!  Being retired & disabled I have to manage my money vvveerryy carefully.  Until the pandemic I subsidized my modest income with "side jobs" from my former Accounting career.  That came to a screeching halt when Covid hit.  Being high risk I couldn't see clients in my home office any longer...  It came down to paying the utilities or eating!  I'm NOT kidding!!  In all my years I'd never been in this position.  Had it not been for ML Insta-cash tiding me over til assistance could arrive I don't know what I would have done.  I'm so grateful & humbled.  It was an added bonus not having to pay ANY interest on the advances as well.  Thank You Money Lion, I'm not a wealthy client but I am a loyal one!!

name: customer
reviews: When it comes to disputing things that aren't correct they debate on if they want to give you your money back or let whoever took it keep it. Then it takes literally fourteen days to get a new card, the virtual card only works in limited stores and grocery stores. It's not an all out card like they say it is. Secondly the staff doesn't seem to grasp the urgency or magnitude of someone's issue their having. Sadly I been a card user for nearly two and a half years but over the past 3 months the service and customer support has been so terrible I have been ready to go back to my primary banking account and cut ties with Moneylion all together. When trying to apply for loans it doesn't let you update your account if you've lost access. It forces you to try to get your old account information over and over again.
